name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum Duo
about: What it is: New fast repair and youth-generating power: the next generation of the super serum that reduces the look of multiple signs of aging...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness..Formulation: Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Helps lock in moisture for up to 72 hours...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. This comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Experience the next generation of Estée Lauder’s revolutionary formula—the most comprehensive Advanced Night Repair serum ever. Patented until 2033, and now with Chronolux™ Power Signal Technology, this fast-penetrating face serum reduces the look of multiple signs of aging caused by the environmental assaults of modern life. Skin looks smoother and less lined, younger, more radiant and even toned. Over time, pores look diminished. This formula is shown to be effective for all skin tones...This Set Contains:.- 2 x 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex..Clinical Results: In consumer testing on 543 women, after 3 weeks:.- 88% of women said skin looked more youthful.- 89% of women agreed skin feels firmer.- Skin looks healthy with a new bounce and vitality.- Over time, pores look diminished
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Locks in moisture for up to 72 hours....Water\Aqua\Eau, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Peg-8, Propanediol, Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Methyl Gluceth-20, Glycereth-26, Peg-75, Butylene Glycol, Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Tripeptide-32, Sodium Hyaluronate, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Lactobacillus Ferment, Cola Acuminata (Kola) Seed Extract, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Algin, Pantethine, Caffeine, Lecithin, Sodium Rna, Bisabolol, Squalane, Glycerin, Oleth-3 Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Oleth-3, Oleth-5, Choleth-24, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Jojoba Wax Peg-120 Esters, Ceteth-24, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Tetrasodium Edta, Bht, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Red 4 (Ci 14700), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140)....Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-In the morning and evening, apply one dropper on clean skin before your moisturizer..-Gently smooth it all over your face and throat....Estée Lauder‘s Heart Ritual:.-Apply a full dropper to the palm of your hand..-Massage onto your face in a heart shape: Using all fingers of both hands, start at the center of your face and move out to ears. Glide hands from the sides of your face down under your chin..-Trace a larger heart from the middle of your forehead out to the temples. Glide down the sides of the face and close the heart again under your chin..-Finish the heart ritual by gently massaging onto your neck in a downward motion.

reviews.review_text: I got this in my advent calendar and I’m glad I didn’t pay for it! My skin is sensitive and it broke it out.It has a lot of crap in it including red and yellow dye. For the price point def not worth it! Biossance has a serum with much more quantity plus better ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is a luxurious addition to any skincare routine, and it truly delivers on its promises. The formula is lightweight, silky, and absorbs beautifully into the skin without leaving a sticky residue. As someone with combination to oily skin, I was initially concerned about whether it might feel too heavy, but it strikes the perfect balance hydrating without clogging pores. Hyaluronic acid boosted hydration and improved the skin’s elasticity and texture. After a few days of nightly use, I noticed a significant reduction in dullness and fine lines, with my skin looking plumper and more radiant by morning.

reviews.review_text: I put this on night and day--face, neck and hands. Even when my skin feels a little irritated for whatever reason, I can still put this on and it feels calming. I've been using this consistently for 9 months now and I do feel it's been supportive in giving my skin a more healthy and plumper looking appearance.

reviews.review_text: I wish I didn't love this as much as I do, but alas, here I am, on my 4th bottle in 2 years. My pores look refined and smooth, I have little to no texture on my skin and my fine lines are significantly softened.  I don't love the price, so I'll be honest and say that I go to beauty counters and kindly ask for samples of it after making a purchase, and purchase the full size during sales only, or at discount stores like T***xx.

It’s been almost a year now and the scars are fairly faint (they will always be there, but they are mostly flat and smooth), due to a steady-handed emergency room doc, a scar cream (used for two months), and this lovely serum.  It will take a lot for me to remove this from my nightly routine.

reviews.review_text: NOT A GIFT OR PAID PROMO) [I see a lot of reviews on Sephora that are paid/gifts. Or the person has received them via influencter or similar websites. This is why I decided to start reviewing all the products I have spent an insane amount of money on, especially this HUNDRED dollar serum]  This is a good serum. It hydrates, plumps, feels luscious, and even looks good under makeup.  I have seen no long term reduction in fine lines. It has pore-clogging ingredients and I do notice that my skin gets closed comedones from this when paired with pretty much any primer. It is quite heavy and made of a nice glass. It looks good on the counter.  It is fragranced, by natural things I suppose. It has a similar smell to drugstore olay products. I’m not sensitive to fragrance so I don’t mind, but the fragrance itself isn’t all that nice.  The dropper SUCKS. It barely picks up product. I have to scrape the edges of it to get enough for face and neck. Overall I really like it but it not good enough for the price point and I haven’t noticed any effects besides hydrating. There are much better anti aging products. Anyhow, you can spend all the money on skincare you want but manage your expectations. Nothing with get you results like procedures done in a medspa so save for that instead of getting this serum

It also helps with the dryness as long as a pair it with a very moisturizing cream (usually the cream by itself is not enough). I apply it in the morning after washing and at night right before applying the Retin-a. On days that my skin is less dry, this is moisturizing enough by itself. I imagine this plus sunscreen would be enough during the summer for my oily skin.  I don't know how I would feel about it if I wasn't using Retin-a, but it does make your skin look and feel really moist and glowy after application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really do like this serum.  I view bifida ferment lysate as a soothing ingredient.  It possibly has antioxidant and barrier repair properties but I like to think of this as a probiotic soothing skin supplement.  It also has other soothing ingredients like chamomile and bisabolol.  Hydrating ingredients like squalane, glycerin, hyaluronic acid, and B5.  I am glad this high end brand has dropped the fragrance from this serum.  I do wish they'd also drop the dyes since they don't serve a real purpose.  I like the natural scent this product has- it's almost like a gingery Cola smell.  I love pairing this serum with other pre and probiotic ingredients like oats, thermal spring water, snail mucin, etc. for soothing the skin.  I took one star off for the insane price point.  It's a good serum but extreme price tags are rarely justified.  There are many other more affordable bifida products on the market that would provide similar results
Effective and easy to use.  Advanced Night Repair.
My holy grail! Always always excited for this part of my skin care routine! Super worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first used this during my mid twenties when ANR was still the original formula - before it underwent god knows how many reincarnations. Back then I used to find it would help a little with the odd acne mark that would appear every few weeks but did little else for my skin concerns. I was primarily using it in the hopes of some sort of defense against future ageing, but I can't say whether or not it achieved anything, as once the bottle ran out I started using other products and then recently thought why not give it another go?   So onto the latest version 'Synchronized Recovery Complex' which I tried earlier this year. I don't know if it's the fact that 'Tocopherol Acetate' (Vitamin E) has been pushed down to 30th place on ingredients list (used to be 13th), or whether it's because 'Retinyl Palmitate (an ester of Vitamin A) has been completely removed from the new version, but this one didn't do anything for acne marks whatsoever and I used it for over a month. It makes sense as both of those ingredients, especially Vitamin A in any form, are known to help fade marks. Add to that a whole host of new and unpronounceable ingredients and that probably explains why if anything I'd experienced even more breakouts when using this...although which one (or more) of the many new ingredients is the culprit I couldn't say! Not sure why they just couldn't let a good thing be and have to change/ruin it?   ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‘Peter Thomas Roth’ – Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: ‘Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: ‘Nuxe’ – Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: ‘Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Lin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Everyone says that the ingredients individually aren’t worth the money, but there is something about the formula as a whole and they were right. I have an extensive skincare routine with and high and low end products. I will add one product at a time to see if I want to repurchase or not, I definitely will be. I don’t have problem skin, but I’m 38 and my skin is starting to not be so firm and is dry in the winter. When I use this I wake with firm and glowing skin. It is also very hydrating and sometimes I will use during the day as well. It may not be worth the money if you are in your 20s, but if you are in your late 30s I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for about a year and it made absolutely no difference at all. Now at night I use a retinoid (Algenist Repairing oil), argan oil and Lancome absolue cream and I wake up with the most luxurious, plump, nourished, healthy perfect skin w no pores, wrinkles or dark spots or acne scars. This promised to repair at night and did nothing at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like we could have done better with this one. I put it on my face and didn't see much of a difference. I think for the ingredients added, this lacks potential and lack of ingredients. I would not purchase this again although I got the mini size to start with. There are so many other hydrating serums that are not worth this price!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I've searching and mixing and matching for a product or products that will soothe and hydrate my dry, red, sensitive, mature skin. This has worked wonders for me in just a few weeks. Improved texture and hydration and reduced redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No idea why this Is so expensive, but it doesn’t have a scent.  I like it.  The bottle(not the dropper one) is pretty hard to open the first time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, there is a tingling feeling when you put this on. The smell, effect and longevity of this cream are otherwise very pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample and after one use I noticed how smooth my skin was. I decided to buy it in the 1 oz size and have been using it for months now! I see a real difference in the overall complexion of my skin and texture. It’s a bit pricy but you only need 2-3 tiny drops because a little goes a long way! Definitely will be in my nighttime skin routine for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is great for making your skin feel instantly revitalized and youthful and the results are clearly phenomenal. Being a woman in my late 30s it is crucial to find the right moisturizers and skin-care products to keep my face looking healthy and keeping the cells regeneration is key to that. This product does just that with finesse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my 30's but I'm a big believer in taking preventative measures against aging LOL...I was using this off and on for about a year and wasn't too impressed with the results but at the beginning of this year I decided to try this again but this time pair it with the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Treatment Intense Reset Concentrate and HOLY SMOKES WHAT A DIFFERENCE!! Together they make a POWER HOUSE. Another big key is to BE CONSISTENT. It took about 2-2 1/2 weeks for me to see results but man my skin looks AMAZING! So smooth, firm, even and radiant! Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am allergic to chamomile. This serum makes my face hot and burns. I wanted to like it and use it with my EL moisturizer, but I cannot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this serum from a sample bottle I got over 3 weeks. I am neutral about it. It made my skin feel nice but not any different from cheaper serums. I was going to give it 3 stars, but because of the price i dont think is worth it so i gave it 2.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!! Its just amazing !!! Wow, wow, wow !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This product is a game changer. Highly recommend. I used it for a week but I could see a difference in my skin texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. Pricey, but worth it! The scent and feel are lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a week, felt a noticeable difference in the smoothness of my skin. When I washed my face I could feel more water running off of it! But my skin is settling down and I am very happy now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do yourself the favor and just click buy. I started with a sample size because let’s face it, this is an investment. It takes a bit of time to see the impacts but once you do you’ll find you can’t live without it. My skin tone has become so even. I struggle with mild rosacea and this has significantly helped reduce redness and irritation. It feels gorgeous on the skin, not tacky, and absorbs well. It also plays nicely with SPF, other serums, makeup. A large bottle might give you sticker shock but it’ll last six months.

reviews.review_title: Mrs. Lauder's Advanced Night Repair is effective!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 'returning' Estee Lauder customer. I was quite surprised to find that Mrs. Lauder's Advanced Night Repair is just as effective as her Night Repair that I used in the 1980's. It promotes smooth, soft, and dewy-looking skin as it did 30 years ago. Thanks for quality control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 2 weeks in and my forehead lines has been steadily decreasing; I'm looking forward to see if it can work its magic into the pores and general skin texture as well. I've got sensitive skin but the product is gentle -- no issues so far! While it's pricey, the bottle will last you a while with 3-4 drops a night. Update: by the end of the bottle the serum lost its effectiveness - I'm not sure whether it got expired? I'm rather sad really.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A big thank you to Estee lauder and Influenster for giving me a free sample to try. This made my eleven lines less deep and my tired under eyes look like I get enough sleep. I didn't think this would make such a noticeable difference but it did and I love it. The smell is pleasant and it leaves my skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Many of them aren’t disclosing. I don’t know if that’s what’s going on with this but it didn’t smell the same and wasn’t the consistency. I used it before bed and I woke up to a swollen sunburnt looking face that was sticky. Nothing like what I used before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: incredible!!! thats all i have to say! wear it at night and wake up with incredible skin

reviews.review_text: I started using this and I don’t plan on ever stopping. It’s pricey but it’s so good, it sinks right in! My skin is dry, acne prone, inflamed, and sensitive. This feels so good, and doesn’t make any of my concerns worse. I’m in my 20s and I honestly can see this saving time off my age and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product Este Lauder. It has a beautiful effect of constant application and you can see tge effect. I use most of the product and make ups. All of the skin care I recommend. I love the double foundation. The perfume is amazing. All amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute fav. If you’re on the dance try this once and you’ll be hooked for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got sample small ones with my Sephora points and expected absolutely nothing. I am a skincare junkie and I know my ingredients and I thought people who liked this just didn’t know any better. Well... My skin immediately became bright and glowy.  It makes no sense because you can find “dupes” with seemingly better ingredients for so much less. It must be something about the formulation. Nothing but retinals and Vitamin C serum work magic like this for me. For reference, 57 years old, normal to dry skin.

reviews.review_title: The furthest thing from CLEAN beauty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know why anyone would want to use this when it contains two different cancer causing PEGS and a host of other chemicals that cannot be pronounced. Don’t use this . Just buy a good retinol. This is totally worthless and does nothing except empty your wallet.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Product with a Few Minor Issues
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m generally not a fan of this brand as I find it to be over priced for what it does and far too perfumed. That said, this stuff is amazing. It works very quickly and there is a noticeable difference in my skin after one use. It also did not cause my already acne prone skin to break out or become irritated. I wake up feeling soft, smooth, and dewy but not oily. My only gripe is this stinks! The smell is chemically and overall gross. I am guessing it has to do with the ferment ingredients. Two, if you are not careful and get this too close to eyes, it will burn. Three, it’s pricey. I can get past the smell and the eye issue, but daily use with this will definitely add up price wise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the sample version. This stuff is CRAZY. One night and I saw a difference. I wish I could afford the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my skin so soft and I’ve noticed my pores on my forehead becoming less noticeable. A small amount goes a long way so I think if you really want to splurge on a product, this would be a great choice. Smells interesting but not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give 10stars if given that option. This is a liquid serum to be applied in the am and pm (recommended). The serum is not strong scented and absorbs into the skin immediately. I like to do half a long drop onto the skin directly instead of dropping it in my palms and then applying it to my skin (by the time I do this the serum has already absorbed into my palms!). I like to gently glide the serum all around my face. If you add too much serum it will be harder to apply other products on top and will start to flake off. This is a buildable serum, so you can apply a thin layer of this and then add your sunscreen/ moisturizer (morning or night routine). It works well and I’ve been using the product both in the am and pm before my sunscreen and moisturizer.   I’ve noticed the following:  Within 7-10 days of use (am and pm): most noticeable change is the wrinkle and smoothness under/ around my eye area. It improved dramatically. Overall, skin texture more even, plump and healthy. Skin tone and elasticity of my skin also improved.  Overall, very good and strong product. I enjoyed the old formula (right hand side of the photo) but I like the new formula much better (left side). This is worth every penny and I strongly urge women to be kind to themselves and invest in a good serum for their daily routine.   Both the serums look the same and smells the same. The packaging is different as you can tell. I will be repurchasing and highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only gotten the sample bottles twice with my purchase points and used under my eyes. I’m 57 and have combination skin. I absolutely loved it, very hydrating and the only product that felt like a drink of water under my eyes. I only use it at night and only under my eyes because I could never afford to use it all over my face every day but if you are someone who could purchase this night serum I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic product. It takes a lot for me to write a review or even notice a difference with skin products but this is a game changer and hope it is for you as well. My pores are smaller, my skin complexity is improved and it is not greasy but hydrates well. If I could give it a 10 I would!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free in the mail from Amazon. I love it. It’s not greasy or oily, absorbs fast.  But, I gave it 4 stars not 5 because L’Oréal night cream works better overall and it’s a little cheaper or around the same price, depending on where it’s purchased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum, no irritation at all and feels great on my skin. My skin feels moisturizer and plump after applying it to my face. Little to no fragrance, didn’t cause any breakouts. Really happy with this product and will continue to use!

reviews.review_title: Did absolutely nothing for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a full size bottle of this product as a free gift with purchase during a Black Friday event. After reading reviews and doing research, I have tried this product numerous times trying to get into it because everyone and their sister seems to love it. Unfortunately, I just don't feel like it does anything for my skin. It's not good, it's not bad, it's just an overpriced serum that does nothing. I have tried using it as a serum alone, as a serum with toner, as a serum with other serums, with different cleansers and moisturizers. No matter how I used it, it did nothing for my skin. Save yourself some money and buy a better night repair, because this doesn't seem to be worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Woke up the next morning to dry patches on my face and it was redder than usual.  So I believe probably not the best product of you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the trial size version of this- and I have never had a trial product blow me away before like this did. I’m 27 yrs old with combo skin, some days my skin can get rly dry (hello Canadian winter) and other days my skin is fine. I use this at night when I notice my skin could use a little quenching and I wake up with perfect, hydrated even skin in the morning. This is a staple product for me now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I been getting the samples for this product and I love it. I mostly use it for under eye and I have seen a difference ( skin looked brighter, lines are diminishing ) but it’s way to expensive to incorporate this in my daily skin regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best product from Estée Lauder. Skin feels fresh and dewy in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the 100 point sample for this product and used it for a couple of weeks - I definitely noticed that my pores got smaller and my skin looked even and didn’t break out with it.  I don’t think it has much success with fine lines which is why I reduced by a star.  I don’t think it’s worth the price - it was just fine - I’ve used better serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a cut from shaving on my shin, raw would took forever to heal. out if desperation I applied this serum sample on the wound to see if it will help. IT DID! totally converted me to to get these babies for my skincare staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am 51, and have used this product since I was in my 20s. It is one of the few that never breaks me out, never irritated, doesn’t smell badly, and always delivers results. I have light olive skin, lifelong acne, and a lot of sun exposure in my past. Just this year am I getting any crows feet or change in texture (thanks to the estrogen drop-off of perio). I wear it morning and night, and put it on my eyes, lips and neck. It’s not a lifting/firming item, so I add other products to address those issues. Fwiw, people in their mid-30s assume that we are age peers and ask me what I use on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product!!!!! I’ve had so much trouble breaking out and finding my skin care routine that works and keeps my breakouts at a minimum. This serum makes my skin glow in such a noticeable way that people I see once in a while have commented on how great my skin looks!! I bought the mini size and it lasted me almost a month and finally broke down and bought the 1oz because of how amazing this makes my skin look and feel, I highly recommend you try this even if some of the reviews are questionable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a game changer. I had heard a lot about this. but since I have sensitive skin, did not want to buy the big bottle rightaway and so  Iordered mini size. ANDDDDDDDD it does not disappoint. It is really amazing, my skin felt healthier, pores minimized and overall felt great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Advanced Night Repair for years and have really noticed a difference.  It goes on nicely.  I have noticed though a buildup around the screw cap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only been using this product for 3 days & I’ve noticed a difference in my skin a little bit more every time I use it. The morning after the first time I used it, I almost thought I fell asleep with makeup on because my complexion looked so even. My pores are smaller, my tone and complexion are more balanced and even, I’ve never used something that has shown visible improvements this fast. I’m excited to see what my skin will look like after the whole bottle! For reference I’m 26F, medium olive skin tone w/ combo sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have an oily skin and in my early thirties this serum applies nicely and leaves no residue. Preps the skin before makeup application and helps to keep makeup on place. Very much recommend for weddings or special occasions or just as little bonus to your skin as a quality primer.

reviews.review_title: A must for us with dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I figured I'd try this after hearing so much about it and I see what all of the hype is about. I have really dry skin and was using retinol but it dried my skin out even worse than it was so I had to stop using it. When I started using this it helped my skin so much that I figured I'd try the retinol again and now my skin looks and feels so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! I received it as a sample and just purchased the full size. I think it’s so worth the $$. My skin looked smooth, even and healthy after using this!

reviews.review_title: Removed fine wrinkles, makes skin glow, moisturize
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum definitely works.  It prevents the skin from drying out, makes the skin glow and removes fine wrinkles.  However, this serum is overpriced.  You can find cheaper skin moisturizers that do the same thing.  I sometimes use this serum with my dermaroler.  And sometimes I use a serum with an RF face lifting machine or without. Most likely I will buy this serum in a small bottle and use it not every day, like I do now

reviews.review_title: Amazing add-in with Retin-A for acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've had acne for over 17 years and finally started using Retin-A to treat it. Retin-A leaves my skin vulnerable and dry, and was only okay at treating my acne. Adding this serum has been a SKIN.SAVIOR. My skin has never looked better. It's glowing, my acne is almost all gone and heals quickly from breakouts. I stopped using the serum for a couple of weeks and there was a noticeable difference in my skin for the worse. I never thought I'd find such a holy grail for treating acne/aging/pores. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this because so many people rave about it. I think it is a great serum but not for acne prone people. 2 of the ingredients listed are ranked very high as far as acne causing. I had no idea these ingredients were even in it until I broke out with cystic acne and then did some research. Such a shame they had to put those ingredients in it. It would be perfect otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overpriced, basic serum that will pill if used with the wrong products. I’ve been using for a few months and don’t see a visible difference. If anything, my skin has been more hydrated. Not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest this one doesn’t work !  Don’t waste your money really ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love the effect of this on my face, my skin is more hydrated and more glowy. But the smell......THE SMELL is horrible. I gag everytime i put it on. Smell like when you take a really big sniff in the bottle of tequila.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so, I don't get the hype. Everyone and their dog has heard of ANR and the hefty price tag that comes with it. People rave about it, swear by it, and claim it's the fountain of youth serum. But yea, it's just ok for me. ⁠ ⁠ When I was midway through the bottle, I still had hope. But I finished the bottle this past weekend and I can confirm, it didn't do much for me. My pores look the same, my skin tone never evened out, and I don't think I have any fine lines for this to diminish. My skin IS soft but I don't think it was this product (I've been using Snail Mucin). The one thing it did give me was a glow...but for $95, that's an expensive glow!⁠ ⁠ Maybe my expectations were too high or maybe I'm not the right target for this product. Whatever the reason, I'm not going to be repurchasing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for everyone. This product has a lot of really great reviews, so I pulled the trigger on it. It causes me to breakout in very small postules around my mouth. They're not even like pimples, but very small ones with white puss (sorry so gross).  I used it for a month and didn't see any difference in my skin. Not more than I could have with a product 1/3 the cost of this one. My advice would be try Honest beauty facial oil first - it's organic, $23 and doesn't make my skin breakout in mini pimples. For note: I have combination skin - dry if not moisturized, but oily t-zone throughout the day.

Now after three weeks of using the product, my family has been commenting on how my skin looks a lot brighter and rejuvenated. It really smoothens the appearance of pores and fine wrinkles.

Please be careful!!! Ive been using this product for a while and today I went to use some and a small GLASS SHARD came out of the dropper. I didnt see it and cut my finger when I rubbed the product between my fingers. Unfortunately will be throwing out the bottle because I can’t risk cutting my face by accident.

reviews.review_title: A+ results!! Tried a sample and bought full size.

reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about two months, now, replacing the serum I normally use with this while keeping the rest of my nightly skincare routine (Cleanser > toner > serum > moisturizer) same as usual.  Early on -- immediately after first application, my skin did look brighter and felt hydrated.  It didn’t feel sticky, it didn’t feel slippery, either.  I did get one pimple that night — not a breakout — and it faded the next day.   After just 7 days, my pores had improved -- now, my skin looks smoother.  This product to deliver as promised. Impressive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way and it is very moisturizing. However I have sensitive skin and it made me break out quite bad. I had high hopes and was dissapointed. For this reason I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for almost two weeks now and can 100% see the difference. My skin looks younger, softer, even my cheeks have a rosy glow like the color in my face is improved. The lines have improved. Granted, I’m 33 so I’m trying to do preventative care. But I definitely see a difference. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had the trial size and my skin feels amazing! Just purchased the 30ml! Can’t wait!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the main benefit of this product is it's penetrating and hydrating ingredients. You mix Squalane, Glycerin, and Hyaluronic Acid together with the elevating Caffeine and other ingredients...you can't possibly not get moisturized skin. It's soothing and has many benefits without drawbacks. It doesn't conflict with any actives or retinols in the routine yet offers that extra shot of supple hydration that your skin needs if you are introducing it to chemicals regularly. It seems that the main attractiveness of this serum is it's patented formula that is fast penetrating. When doing a skincare routine you want the product to get into your skin as fast and deep as possible in order to reap the benefits, so I assume that is the advantage of a more expensive, high-end serum versus a more basic combination of ingredients offered at a lower price. I think this product would probably benefit mature skin immensely while younger skin can take more preventive steps at a more affordable price. I received this sample in the Best of Dermstore kit and hope to continue to include this in my skincare in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a serum/essence girl but I loved this one! First I loved that the #complimentary #sample was this cute mini-bottle (and even came in a box) vs just a sachet! This allowed me a good 3 uses at least so could get a good idea of the product and see the cumulative effect of using it a few days. The box itself is pretty with the blue colour, the bottle reminds me of something my fancy grandma would have the brown being a little mature and the gold being luxe. I think the bottle would be good to reuse as well for a weekend away holding just enough (when we can travel again) Now the best part - I actually felt/saw a difference with this serum!! My skin feels smoother, more even and replenished! I would highly recommend this product and is something I would invest in and add to my skincare routine! I have also just tried the NeoStrata brightening serum and would add that in in the mornings from no serums to two I really like :) I know lots of people love and use this Estée Lauder product and can second all the rave reviews #Skincare #Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if the formula has changed or my face must be really dry. I dont remember it drying up so quick when I apply it. well, I will give it time. My face still feels super dry, but it has only been a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I miss a day or two of application I notice my face looks dull and flat. This serum helps to plump my skin, even out my complexion, and helps heal hormonal breakouts faster. I apply in both the am and pm and follow up the Estée Lauder moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally, I think this product works best using it once a day preferably at night (2 drops). My skin is super sensitive so doubling up on a highly concentrated serum such as this twice a day is too much for my skin to handle. I notice if I use it too much, I start to develop red bumps on my face. Overall, it does a good job at leaving your face smooth, hydrated, and glowy; howerever; I haven’t noticed any significant changes regarding hyper pigmentation, acne, or dark spots. My redness has slightly subsided but not dramatically. It definitely takes about 2-3 weeks to see more substantial results, so hang in tight before you decide to ditch it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way it makes my skin dewy the next day. But I don’t think it removes the sunspot as many people claim. Also, I wish the applicator was user-friendly, it pull through only a  very small amount of essence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has saved my skin! After I reached my 40s I really began to see changes I wasn’t happy about. This serum has been just, wow... amazing. After using for just a month, I’m just amazed, my skin kinda glows and my makeup applies so much smoother. I had redness on my chin and cheeks, it is GONE. This is SO worth every penny and I’m so excited to see what the results will be with continued use.  I apply this morning and night, right before my moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this serum. I use this before bed and wake up looking fresh-faced and dewy. My skin loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best skincare product I've ever tried! When I got my free sample from EL (btw it was my first product of this brand) I was rather skeptical, but wanted to know why so many people were raving about it. Well, I have to say that as soon as my sample was over I immediately bought a couple of full-sized bottles when they went on sale. The product is just great in every way. It's well-absorbed and lightweight, doesn't leave any sticky residue, which makes it perfect for layering. I can use it both AM and PM and my skin doesn't feel overloaded with skincare. My skin is combination-oily, with rather visible pores, but only after 3 days of PM usage I noticed that my skin texture improved. I don't wake up oily or textured, but rather plumped and moisturized (even when I was using the serum alone with no moisturizer on top to test it's true abilities). It's hard for me to tell if it does anything for wrinkles because I hardly have any. But even my husband admitted that my skin is looking more peachy and healthy now. The price tag is not low, for sure, but the peachy freshness the serum gives is rather worth the money.

reviews.review_title: Save your skin ladies and use this every night!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!  I received a sample earlier this year.  A little goes a long way.  I finally bought a bottle using a gift card and I use it every night.  Being a woman of color this is a must have.  I had to order it online because the store doesn't carry it was the only down fall but it came on time.

reviews.review_title: Noticeable difference after just two weeks!

reviews.review_text: This serum is amazing. I use it morning and night after I tone (before putting on moisturizer). After just two weeks, I'm seeing a noticeable difference in the size of my pores and I feel like my skin is more balanced and not producing as much oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product IS expensive but a little goes a long way.  I didn't notice a difference until maybe a month or two into using this nightly. I'm 30 so I did start taking care of my skin with SPF and all that but at night, my go to is this night repair serum before I apply my moisturizer.  I don't notice any scents and it glides on so smoothly and thin that it doesn't feel like there's anything on your face. No irritation either!  I definitely notice in the diminishing appearance of my small dry spots and wrinkles. My skin has gotten much smoother than just using the moisturizer alone. I really think that if you use this serum in conjunction with a good diet, it will make all the difference in the world in giving you that youthful look.

However, it smelled very natural and medicine when applied. It broke me out the next morning I used it and when I stopped using it my face didn’t break out. I gave it another chance but it broke me out more. So I did not have the best experience for my combination dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum. So soothing after cleansing my skin, and definitely feels like it is brightening and rejuvenating my skin. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day sample size so I can't speak to the full claims of 3 week results but after 7 days I did find the following: The first thing you'll notice is the consistency, which seems thicker than other products you are likely used to, but it absorbs like a dream. It does have a strong scent (not a chemical scent...just a noticeable aroma), which fades very quickly after application - I know this is an issue for some but it is gone the second it absorbs, which is fast. While I didn't notice all the changes the product claimed in 7 days I did wake each morning with noticeably softer skin. It also appeared smoother and more refined by the end of the week. With the results I experienced in 7 days, minimal though they may be, it was enough to make me believe that had I used it for a full 3-4 weeks I would have observed a noticeable difference. I would definitely consider adding it to my skincare regimen. (Sidenote: I read an interview with actress Gillian Anderson, Scully from The X-Files, and she swears by this...and if her skin is any indication of what long-term results are then sign me up because she looks AMAZING.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I revived this serum complimentary from influencer for reviewing purposes. I will most def be buying this the second I run out. I have oily/combination skin and I hate it when serums feel too oily on my skin, not this one tho. This serum sinks into the skin so fast amd leaves my face looking hydrated,  plump, and glowing. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good night serum that actually works and see a difference.

I was lucky enough to have received the product complimentary from Influenster to test out. This is definitely going on my list of things to budget for!! I'm in my mid 30's and while I don't have any deepest lines I do have fine lines under my eyes, smile lines around my mouth and a slight crease in my forehead. Products like this one helped with all of those areas and also helped brighten my skin At the same time! It's a definite product to try if you are looking for something good skincare. Estee Lauder foundation is one of my favorite foundations so I had high hopes for the serum and it did not disappoint!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Say goodbye to fine lines and dark under eyes!  This lightweight formula keeps you from feeling greasy after use, hydrates wonderfully and doesn’t clog up your pores.  Soaks in fast. After consecutive days of use it made my skin nice enough in the morning that I found myself using less primer.  The pricetag is a bit large but you truly get what you pay for with this one.    I received this product complimentary from Influenster for review purposes.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating Night Serum, Not The Best Anti-Aging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very hydrating, and I like that it’s a gentle nighttime serum. It also helped calm my skin during what was probably the WORST breakout of my life, like bordering on cystic acne level and I haven’t had a problem with acne (other than a few zits here and there over the years) in like 15+ years. That was definitely a relief. Personally, I really liked it and I thought the little sample bottle I got free from Influenster lasted a long time (10ml, no dropper to measure, used almost every night starting late August with very little left now, 10/26 so with that in mind a 1oz bottle very well could last 6+ months for me) I’m not sure I’d be willing to pay $75+ for just the hydrating properties and small boost in radiance. When I’m seeking an anti-aging product like this, I generally reach for retinol serums - though they are a little harsher on your skin they compared to this, a very gentle serum, I see more anti-aging results with the retinol serum I currently have. That visibly reduced the “frown line” between my brows, and all but got rid of my smile lines. Advanced Night Repair did not help with those things. So I suppose whether you like it or not, really depends on what you’re looking for. If you want smoother skin, hydrated skin, more radiance, this serum is for you and you are really going to love it & start to see results after a week or so. But if you’re in your early 30’s, looking for help with fine lines and early wrinkles, loss of plumpness in your face, I’d recommend Sunday Riley A+ Retinoid serum, and start to see results from that after induction + a month or so of continued use. Despite not having retinol, I’d still recommend it as a good product for certain skin issues like dryness & dullness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item through Infuenster as a sample and let me just say that a little goes a long way. The consistency is very nice it's like applying a thin layer of refreashing water on your face. it's not sticky which I love and my face definitely felt hydrated the only downside would be that when applying it, at least to me it's smells very much like vitamins I guess another word would be pharmaceutical but other than that a good product. Over all it's hydrating, doesn't smell too great, and maybe 2 weeks in I noticed a difference in more radiate skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used Estee makeup for years! This was another great product. Anytime I apply i ca notice a difference with in a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Growing up my mom swore by Advanced Night Repair!....Dry skin? Advanced night repair! Dull skin? Advanced night repair! Acne scar? Advanced night repair! Boy problems? Advanced night repair! She was this serum’s it’s #1 fan.  Believe it or not, this new formula made the original even better! It feels nice on my skin and absorbs quickly. Within just a few days I noticed the benefits of this serum. My skin was more hydrated, plump, and glowing. I have combo oily skin and my cheeks can get very dry. This serum soothed the redness caused by dryness and hydrated my skin immediately. It also smoothed and evened my complexion and I found myself needing less concealer/foundation during the day. Apply this serum before bed and let it work it’s magic! Highly recommended product!  I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes. My review is my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from influenster and I loved this product. I used it for a week straight and noticed instant results. I will be purchasing the bigger bottle so that I can use it longer. I definitely recommend trying this product out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complementary sample of this product to give an honest review. I genuinely believe that unless this product is supposed to show immediate results, a weeks worth of a sample will not help to show optimal results. While I did notice that this product is hydrating, I did not notice any drastic change in my skin or any kind of glow. I have used other products that dramatically change skin after 1 use and this is not it. I do not have wrinkles but I do have some fine laugh lines. This product did nothing for that within 1 week. I do not believe it is worth the price tag. Also, a bit of advice: if you can, make an appointment with a dermatologist to find out what active ingredients work best with your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

My skin looks brighter, and it’s overall healthier looking. I received this product complementary for testing purposes, but I will buy again.

I continued using the serum for about two weeks (1x at night) and I did notice smoother skin, smaller pores, and hydration. I still had to use moisturizer, but that’s a given. I feel I got the best results by applying it with my PMD Clean. This serum also has a nice scent!  Overall, it’s a great product. Personally, though, I can’t bring myself to spend so much on the product.   TL;dr; great serum, worth it if you don’t mind the expensive price.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I was pleased to receive a complementary sample to try and to review as I have noticed some new fine lines. I used the product faithfully every night after washing up before bed. The texture was light and sheer. After the first week, I noticed a difference in the tone and radiance of my skin. After finishing the sample bottle, I loved the way my skin looked so much I purchased another bottle for myself and one for my mom. I definitely notice a difference in the tone of my skin and fine lines. I can be prone to acne with certain products, but the advanced night repair didn't clog my pores, had a very light and gentle scent and feels lovely. I'm committed.

reviews.review_text: My skin is sensitive, dry, and prone to redness. This serum definitely helped improve my skin’s hydration and radiance. However, it had a strong smell which I found unpleasant.

reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin so it’s hard to find sometimes  a good product for me but this one I really like! I feel my skin smooth and hydrated. I used it 3/4 days per week.

reviews.review_text: I received a free sample in an influencer voxbox and while I love that it contains hyaluronic acid i don't feel it lives up to its expectations.  Other bonuses is it claims to have antioxidants to help against environmental damage to your skin which is great but still not impressed.. saw no visible difference in skin condition. I will say it does feel smooth while applying to your skin and leaves you feeling super hydrated. Probably won't be purchasing but wold recomend for a preventative just don't think it helps after fine lines are already there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Advanced Night Repair almost religiously for the last 4 years. After working for other skincare brands and trying like-items, I always go back to ANR. It’s simply the best. It’s changed the texture of my skin. Helps with discoloration, and even breakouts.  Most notably, it’s hydrating. Sometimes my double-wear foundation is a little too drying (during the winter in particular) so I add a drop of ANR and it’s perfect. I know that this is a new formula, but I was thrilled that it didn’t change the results. I am just as happy as the old formula, and after longer use (I only had a week’s sample) I’m sure I will notice a more visible change. I recommend it for all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product via Influenster. The sample was small, but I did notice differences in my fine lines during the time it was used. The texture of my skin was also improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used an older formula of Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair a few years ago, I remember It did not really help much with my younger skin. But as I am about to turn 30 soon and have been noticing wrinkles and lines around lip and eye areas and less firm skin, this updated version of Advanced Night repair came on time.  Because of my hormonal breakouts, I often use tons of strong acne products on my skin, so this was quite effective for smoothing and hydrating my skin, without making it oilier, which is very important for me. In the morning after applying this, my skin looked cleaner, brighter and felt softer that I don’t even want to wash its residue or film it leaves to keep the result all day lol.  I noticed that since I included this serum in my nighttime skincare routine, my BB cream sat on my skin more evenly, with no flaky patches throughout the day.  I liked its silky, non-greasy and quick-absorbing texture. The smell is weird like a plastic material, but tolerable.  To really see its wrinkle reduction effect, I need to use it for a longer time. Although this tiny 7 ml bottle was enough to use every night for two whole weeks, the full size is too overpriced for me. But I would recommend if you can afford it and it is definitely a must—try.  I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do yourself a favor and buy this, your skin will thank you. I will admit I was skeptical to this product but I received a free sample via the Influenster’s program so I gave it a shot!! I was very pleased with the results!! I have normal skin acne prone skin when I stick to my regular routine, but if I deviate for a couple of days we got a whole Sahara desert going on on my face. I am human and I get lazy to do my routine and my skin suffers. This product takes care of my texture and helped me get that added plump and radiant look. The price is scary but luckily Sephora offers Klarna and it’s credit card, really do yourself a favor and get this for your skin.

reviews.review_title: Promising when paired w/ Intense Reset Concentrate
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of the Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex compliments of influenster and Estée Lauder to use for one week and I liked it. While it is fragrance-free, there’s a fermented scent some might not love though it fades quickly and didn’t bother me. My skin quickly soaked it up and I was blown away by how deeply moisturized it left my skin, especially when paired with the Intense Reset Concentrate!   My skin felt soft, smooth and incredibly hydrated — it even looked more plump and radiant when I woke up. I was also impressed with the skin barrier repair function and how quickly it relieved my sensitive skin’s retinoid-induced irritation. I was, however, disappointed in the inclusion of sodium hyaluronate over a direct form of hyaluronic acid, which offers pro-repair support far beyond basic water hydration that sodium hyaluronate offers. That would be my expectation of a hyaluronic acid serum at this price point.  This ANR serum seems promising, but one week simply isn’t enough time to see noticeable results that justify the $75/oz price. As such, I cannot speculate whether it delivers promised results with consistent use of at least 2 months (I’m skeptical of the 72 hour hydration claims). I gave it 3 stars because of the price and the cheaper form of hyaluronic acid. If you aren’t price sensitive and/or are looking for a hydrating peptide serum, I did enjoyed and recommend trying the new ANR Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex.

It is the perfect blend for a dry face. After one use I woke up and my skin was noticeably hydrated and plump. I would definitely recommend. I received this product complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_text: I received this through Influenster as a free sample in exchange for my honest review.  I was previously using a $15 serum. I thought the Estée Lauder would blow it out of the park. No dice. The first thing to hit me was the not so pleasant smell. Not terrible but certainly not great. The serum absorbed quickly, but day after day, I saw no improvement to my skin. It was somewhat hydrating but couldn’t even compare to my $15 serum on that front. I noticed my fine lines popping up from not receiving their usual intense hydration. In conclusion, this is fine if you have that much money to spend, but honestly there are many better and cheaper options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product. My skin is so bright and youthful looking! A little goes a long way with this product. This is a must have product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rᴀᴅɪᴀɴᴛ, Pʟᴜᴍᴘᴇᴅ, ᴀɴᴅ Hʏᴅʀᴀᴛᴇᴅ. . These are three words I’d use to describe my skin after using the @esteelauder Advanced Night Repair Multi-Recovery Complex. . I’ve been using this serum every night for a couple of weeks (this bottle has lasted me a while!) and I can say that I love what it has done to my skin. . The serum itself is kind of a runny gel like consistency that initially feels a bit sticky when applying, but it completely dissipates when it soaks into your skin. I’ve also noticed that a little goes a long way! . Once I apply it, I notice that my skin has a bit of a glow to it, and it feels instantly plumped and hydrated. I also wake up to a very hydrated, radiant looking complexion. . . PR/Gifted, but reviews are my own. .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Serum has a smooth texture and a nice smell. Does not dry down sticky at all or interfere with my makeup when I used this during daytime. Didn't break me out or irritate my skin. My skin looked and felt hydrated after using. I was given a deluxe sample courtesy of influenster, but my review is my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s good but not worth $100+. It was hydrating but there was no immediate results like it claims. I wouldn’t waste your money. I received this free to test from influencer

It did make my skin feel soft and rejuvenated but I could not see a difference with fine lines. Maybe it would be better when using it longer than I could with a travel size, but I’m not sure I’d be willing to pay the price for it again.

The consistency was very oily, and I did not notice really any difference in my skin after using this. If the sample was larger I may have been able to see if it actually had any effects, but the sample was so tiny and only lasted for seven days.

reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and I like how this product keeps my skin hydrated and dewy. The scent of this product is light and the texture isn’t too sticky. I use this night repair whenever my skin is stressed and/or needs a boost.

However, it blended well with other products, didn’t break me out (I have sensitive skin) and helped keep my skin hydrated overnight. I always woke up with smooth clear skin the next morning, but there are several other products in my evening routine.

I think anyone could enjoy this product, just beware if you have acne as i do see where it could clog pores.

Therefore this product will last for a very long time. However, I tried this product a few different times and my face broke out and got so irritated and sensitive every single time. I have very sensitive skin and maybe that’s why it broke me out. I would not suggest this product to those with sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: Sadly, it is a no for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always try a product with the hopes that I will love it!  I feel that I tend to be more generous with the goods, than the bads of a product.  Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair sample was provided to me as part of an influenster campaign for honest and true feedback.    On the good side, the serum goes on smoothly and made my skin soft, even with just the sample.  On the bad side, the scent is very strong of vitamins and even though vitamins are great, I cannot stand the smell of them.  The scent is strong enough that regardless of the efficacy I simply cannot use this product.

reviews.review_text: I was a little disappointed in the results I had using the advance night repair serum. In my experience with this serum it did make my skin look plump and hydrated but only for so long until my dry spots were looking quite dull and dry again. I used this AM/PM as the application process recommended. I usually don't have to use much with my regular serums and I seemed to have to use more than I usually do with this one. After not even 24 hours I did start breaking out and it persisted as long as I used the serum which I had high hopes that I wouldn't seeing it says it's supposed to be Non-acnegenic. I can't vouch for the other benefits it's supposed to have since I only used it for not even the full week before I ran out of serum. I did receive this product complimentary for testing purposes.

I didn’t see any improvement with my skin, and it actually seemed to dry out my skin, which already had problems with flakiness. Would not recommend for skin types like like. Product doesn’t deliver promised results, and honestly my moisturizer is better at plumping my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from Influenster to try as a sample. It has completely changed my skin texture, wrinkles look so much fainter. Before this product I had extremely oily skin. I would need to wash my face mid day to keep it at bay... which obviously isn't a workable way to live if you like wearing makeup. After using this product I noticed my oil levels changing. I have been using this well over a month now (I bought a bottle immediately after running out of my sample) and I no longer have oily skin. I no longer have to wash my face mid day or worry about oil control. It is amazing. I will not go without this serum from here on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love this serum. I received a sample to try, and am waiting until it fits into my budget to purchase. I felt like my skin was supple, hydrated, and clear every morning when i woke up. I love the feel of this serum, too! It's a favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this serum. It made my skin feel plump and dewy every morning. The only thing I didn’t like about it was the scent. It kinda smelled like chemicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the feel of this serum my skin looked so nice and hydrated. I did notice it looked nicer in general. I would say I feel like it sinks in very quickly almost like I would need to reapply. All on all i like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary to evaluate. All comments are my own. The weight of this product on my skin was great. It was very hydrating and made my skin feel healthy. The price point is the downside for me. While the benefits to the product are great, they are not worth the cost for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is smooth and it does what it says. I really enjoyed it, and my skin feels softer and looks better. My only criticism is the consistency. I feel like it's a bit thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster to try out. Unfortunately it broke me out bad with cystic acne. I’m sure those with dry skin would absolutely love this so I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: as an esthetician I like to try out different skin care lines so that way I'm able to tell clients what I like about them or what I don't and how they affect your skin. With this product I was excited to try it because a lot of my older clients usually buy from department store counters before visiting me. The active ingredients are listed a lot further down, making them not be as active as they should be therefore not giving you the results that you should be getting. It also has added fragrance, and colors. I'm not a fan of that and I felt like I was putting a mixed alcoholic drink on my face. It also made me break out from the oil in it.  I think it's really overpriced for what you're getting I would highly suggest getting a serum from a medical grade skin care line that has proven results. I received a complementary sample of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just completed the first week of the Estee Lauder Night Repair Serum. I used it both atit is a  night and morning for a week. I continued my normal skin care routine as it is suggested to use your normal moisturizer once the product has absorbed.  I have drier skin and needed the added hydration. However, you may not need it if you have a different skin type. I received a one week sample complementary in return for my honest review. During the week i didnt notice a measurable difference.  My skin did stay hydrated. It would be interesting to see the longer term results as they said it takes 3-4 weeks to see the best results. It is a little pricey for the results delivered.  #GenerationANR #contest #complimentary @esteelauder @Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day trial of this product complimentary for my honest opinion. It lasted me 6 days. I added this to my night time routine. It took me about two drops to do my whole face. It has a light pleasant scent. That dissipates quickly. It has a thin consistency that absorbs in to the skin nicely. Doesn’t leave stickiness behind which is a added bonus. After the first night I woke up to my skin feeling soft and hydrated. Through out the week I noticed my skin becoming less dull and much more radiant. I can’t speak to continued use but I can say for the six days that I used it. It made my skin soft, hydrated, plump and radiant. I really enjoyed this product. This is the first product I’ve tried from Estée Lauder and look forward to trying more from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off, not a fan of the scent, but I tend to feel that way about all EL products. The mini sample lasted me about 10 days application, so this review is based on that short time. I loved the way the product felt and applied, absorbed quickly into my skin with a little of the scent remaining. I do feel like my forehead benefited the most because with makeup application everything was smooth! Overall, I liked the serum,  but would need to try longer to be able to tell results and know about continuing usage.

reviews.review_text: I was gifted a sample complimentary of influenster and Estee Lauder and my opinions are my own. As always I'm pleased with Estee Lauder's ability to make products suitable for aging skin. I was able to sample this item for a week in place of my serum in the evening and alongside my serum in the morning. My skin has a healthy glow and feels hydrated yet firmer. With several weeks use you should see a noticeable difference in fine lines, wrinkles, and elasticity. I highly recommend this product! This product is suitable for all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been one of the most effective nightly repair serums Ive ever done. My results have been amazing.  Im really thankful I was chosen for this opportunity..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous product, your face feels instantly tighter! It is a bit pricey and makes me hesitant to purchase it! I would recommend it to someone though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to test and these are my independent thoughts. I have used this product before but received this sample since it has been improved. After application, my face felt tighter and more firm. Unfortunately, I did not feel like these effects were long lasting. Nor did I see results over time when using the product consistently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It did not provide me with enough serum to give a solid 30 days review but i did notice a change in my skin tone and texture and that was awesome. I did start to notice some slight changes to my aging areas but ran out of product to provide more info on that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free for my honest review and although it wasn’t bad I just don’t think it made that much difference in my skin. For the price I can’t see myself recommending it.

I've ran out for a while, but the effects seem to be permanent enough where I see that my skin looks less dull now, but that radiant glow isn't there anymore. I'd get it again if the price was a tad bit lower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received as a complimentary product, and I want to say it felt great but not totally impressed. However acne at the time could’ve affected that.

It actually smells like a pill bottle and I hate that smell but it’s not strong. I mainly smell it when it’s applied under my nose. I’d recommend this product if you have dry skin and want a luxurious product that helps prevent wrinkles and fine lines.  #influenster #complimentary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product! I have extremely dry skin that never feels properly moisturized, until I used this product! I don’t have many fine lines or wrinkles yet, but I found it helped my acne and acne scars heal much faster than ever before. My skin looked great while using this product. My only issue is the price. I’m a college student, so I definitely can not afford this product which is disappointing because I’ve never found anything that worked this well. I may consider it in the future when I hopefully have money, but even then it is still quite pricey even for one ounce. Besides that, if you are able to afford this serum and not have it break the bank, have dry skin, and in need of a good moisturizing serum, I do highly recommend this product. *Received as a complimentary sample from Influenster*

My skin is brighter, and my fine lines around my eyes are reduced. I like to pair this serum with a good eye cream and lock everything in with a moisturizer as a nightly skincare regemin.
