reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the lightweight consistency of this product. It's not overly fragrant and it absorbs nicely into the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a long time fan of the Advanced Night Repair Serum and was recently provided the opportunity to try the new serum. It has a great silky texture, that glides across the face before melting into the skin and healed/improved dark patches of skin literally overnight. I believe the new formula is supposed to be more hydrating, unfortunately I think the new formula also clogged my pores whereas the prior did not. I struggle with adult acne *side eye emoji* especially during the pandemic for some reason and couldn’t really use this product until I got my acne under control. For people who don’t have acne prone skin, especially individuals who want it to repair or smooth out skin, this could be a great addition to ones night routine but I am still on the fence about purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I felt it was a little greasy.  It did leave my skin a little hydrated,  but I did not see any clear results or much change. I would not purchase at this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it made me breakout which has never happened with the old formula. Not sure what went wrong, but I won’t be purchasing. This formula also get stickier than the last one. The bottle has always been very difficult to fully empty as well. I wish they could replace the dropped they use with something more effective and possibly change to a cylindrical bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely found this serum super hydrating, leaving my skin with a dewey glow. It also didn't cause any blatant redness and irritation, which is a plus. It has a nice liquid-gel consistency that absorbs almost immediately and doesn't leave any sticky feeling. However, I did see some breakouts on my cheeks and chin, which make me wonder if it's clogging my pores. Also, oddly noticed that my under-eyes look more delicate and purple than usual after a week of using this serum. I received a week's worth sample, which I believe will last me about 2 weeks since you don't need much product to cover your whole face. A week is clearly not enough time to notice any anti-aging benefits, though, so I can't speak to that, but I would recommend trying it for a few months to anyone who is willing to pay for a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Little to no smell, a small amount of product goes a long way, does not feel sticky or heavy on the skin, dries quickly, left my skin feeling hydrated and looking luminous. Cons: Hefty price tag. Overall, I really enjoyed the product; however, I think that there are comparable things on the market for a fraction of the cost. If cost is not a factor for you, this would be a great skincare staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample from influenster for free.  This product had great consistency (not thick, slimy, or oily) and left my skin feeling good. However, I didn't see any noticeable changes and I could never justify purchasing this based on the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to say right out of the gate that I received a decent sized sample of this product in exchange for a honest review. With that being said, I'm going to be blunt and bullet point this to make things easier for both of us. 1) Pro: It contains no fragrance 2) Con: It smells terrible, but I don't expect something fermented to smell great. 3) Pro: My sensitive skin did not react negatively. 4) Con: 1 week of sampling is not enough time to tell a noticeable difference after switching from other products to this one. Skin cell turnover is roughly a month. 5) Pro: Formulation seems promising. 6) Con: Price. There are other competing fermented ingredient products out there for way less money that have a cult-following for a reason. For this formulation as is, either cut the price to a bit higher than said competitors, or reformulate to make it more beneficial to be a standalone product to quantify the price.

reviews.review_text: After testing out this serum my face feels amazing! I am so happy I was able to try this night repair serum out. I have super dry skin and this product was so great on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Recieved This As A Sample. I Was Pretty Excitied To Try It Since I Have Really Dry Skin And Bags Under My Eyes. It Really Helped With The Dryness Around My Nose Area And It Didnt Feel Like I Had A Bunch Of Crap On My Face. So I Enjoyed It And Plan On Purchasing A Full Bottle So I Can Add This Into My Skin Care Routine For Good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item from Influenster but all opinions are my own. I recently started using this oil and my face looks a lot brighter the next morning! I have mild sensitive skin and it seems like my skin isn’t reacting negatively to it so far. I think I will have to use it a little longer to notice any major differences but so far so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes, but from my experience, it was just okay.. I was given a week sample but a little does go a long way! I was able to use it nightly for about 2 weeks. Sadly, during this time I noticed no difference... Maybe after a month or more, but from what I got I didn’t see any change at all... My skin still was smooth when I woke up so I guess that could be a plus?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this product! I only used it once a day, after cleaning my face. After just one week I noticed a difference in the redness and dryness of my face. I think it's the quickest results of products I have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Perfect to add to a nighttime routine. You only need a tiny bit so it goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.  I love this product, I just finished the bottle and am going to order another one as we speak.  I can tell the difference after using just the small bottle.  My likes on my forehead are smother, my crows feet are smoother and my face is brighter.  I use it daily under my moisturizer and it works amazingly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to test for a review. It seems like a nice serum because it doesn’t have a fragrance and is not sticky. However, I do not notice a difference in my skin between nights I use It and nights I don’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I usually put it in after washing my face before bed! All you need is two drops and I wake up the next morning with my skin feeling great. It’s very nourishing and refreshing. I usually use it about 2-3 a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this before and the new formula is just as good as the last. I wake up with beautiful glowing skin when I use it. It is not cheap but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster. A small amount goes a long way. It’s lightweight, fragrance free, moisturizing, not sticky. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot get enough of this magic potion. I have been fortunate enough to receive two samples and purchased once - and I will keep purchasing regularly! This multipurpose wonder goes on smooth and I awake with a visibly more lovely complexion - cannot recommend enough for all skin types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product for a week and used it both in the morning and at night. I feel that this is a good hydrator and makes skin feel smoother, however I am not sure about how it would affect fine lines due to only having a sample size. I would have to use it longer to know for sure if it works and is worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Can take it or leave it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the texture & scent and the fact that a little really went a long way, but besides that I didn't see any real difference in my skin. It wasn't better, it wasn't worse... It was just my skin. It did leave a little bit of a greasy film on my skin but not terribly so... I didn't hate it, but did I need it in my skin care routine... Probably not. I can go either way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary tester bottle of Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair to test for a week.  Honestly, there was enough packed into that tiny bottle to last more than 3 weeks!  It kept my skin feeling very hydrated overnight and into the next day.  However, I did not see any actual lasting changes to my skin from this.  It was more hydrated, but I did not see any fine lines lightening or anything of that nature.  To just add some moisture to the skin, this is much to expensive for my taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary and I can tell it’s just awesome, definitely buying the full size. I have oily and sensitive skin and it worked so well is amazing. Won’t tell I’ve seen difference in my fine lines, ‘Cause I haven’t been using it for so long, but it does keep your skin hydrated and luminous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The serum had a nice feel on my skin, after use I didn’t have a greasy or sticky residue. The smell wasn’t over powering, but it also wasn’t great either. The downfalls are the dry skin I was left with after 2 days of using as directed. I normally have greasy skin, and not too many issues with dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a new staple to my extensive night skincare routine! It makes my skin feel super soft in the morning and gives me a glow. The only thing is that I have fairly oily skin so I will probably be using this every other night as opposed to every night but maybe during winter I will need to transition to applying daily. My mother started using it too and she also loves it! *received for testing purpose

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great addition to my skin care routine. I suffer with acne so it is always a bit scary adding new products. However in as little as a week I noticed how great my skin started to look. This left me with an amazing glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smelled great and I appreciated how light and easily and easily it absorbed into the skin - no sticking to the pillowcase or anything like that. After using it for about a wee, I felt that my skin complexion already improved including many post-acne spots that were beginning to fade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a week, the main difference I noticed was that my skin felt more hydrated. I think it did a good job at keeping the moisture in my skin for longer in the day. I received this as a tester but am really debating whether to get it again because, like they say, prevention starts young!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! I highly recommend. It is consistently good and I will continue to use. The newly updated product had beautiful packaging, as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. My only complaint is that I wish I had more! It's helped even out my skin tone and I feel like my pores even look smaller. I received a complimentary sample in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was just okay for my skin. I used it consistently every night but did not see a major difference. I see a lot of negative reviews for the smell but it had a light scent and wasn’t that bad. It easily absorbed in to my skin and left a nice glow but after I slept the glow diminished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, it easily absorbs into the skin but I did not see that much of a difference after a long time use. I would say it's better for someone with more aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a sample size of this product and tried it for seven days. A little bit of product went a long way. It doesn't leave your skin oily. I feel like my skin felt smoother after using it for a few days and my skin looked radiant. I only rated it a 4 because it did leave my skin feeling a little dry afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review from influenster. I received the sample size. I can honestly say the only thing I was not crazy about with this product was the sample size does not come with an applicator. I put this on every night for a month and my skin was so much brighter and looked so much healthier. Due to wearing masks I have not been wearing as much foundation and with this serum I really do not need it. I absolutely love this product. Will have to save my pennies to get the full size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations for this serum. After using it for a week, I noticed my face was radiant and with an even tone. I'm sure if I was to use it for longer I could see more results. One thing I would change about this serum is the scent of it. To me it smelles like wet paint but besides that I liked using it on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little definitely does go quite a long way. Doesn’t feel heavy, oily, or sticky on the skin and I noticed my skin clearing up! This was complimentary through Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will be buying this product again. Due to the price I never would have tried it randomly but I fell in love with it. My skin feels great immediately after applying. I received this product from influencer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel of my skin after using but I have sensitive skin so my face broke out. Don’t know if it’s from using the product or not. I didn’t see much results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster. It doesn't have an overwhelming scent, and i felt like a little truly went a long way. my skin improved noticeably in just a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this product. The Estee Lauder night repair serum left my face glowing. I normally have dry patches and after a week I seen a difference. The formula was not sticky it was more silky than anything. It had a bit of a woodsy smell which did not bother me but of you are sensitive to smells I recommend testing it first. Overall I really liked it!

reviews.review_title: Try it, you will love it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is adorable and the product is perfect! After just a few days I was noticing results and after a week the results were dramatic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After a week I noticed a difference In my skin. It felt smoother and was brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product absorbs into the skin very quickly, and only a drop is needed for the whole face. This makes the product last a long time! It has a very faint vinegar scent, which isn't unpleasant and and fades quickly. I haven't seen a difference in texture in my skin, though I do feel like I am pampering it! I received this product as a free sample from Influenster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this! I grew up knowing my mom and oma spoke highly of the products by ester lauder  I definitely see more of a glow! The product is great! I feel like the price tag is a little bit steep for the amount of product though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum does wonders! I put it on before I go to bed as a part of my night time skincare routine and when I wake up, my face looks so much brighter and hydrated. Even though I’m in my early 20’s, I don’t think it’s ever too early to take care of your skin and invest in good skincare products like this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t wowed by this product especially considering the huge price tag. I did like that the product seemed to soak in quickly. However I don’t love the scent. Plus I didnt notice a huge difference in my skin texture and brightness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product to work your face while you do you! This is a lightweight cool feeling solution that you blend into your face. It has a very light pleasant scent, but not enough to smell after application. I use this morning and night, in the morning under my make up and at night after my shower, before bed. This keeps my face smooth and feeling young. Estee Lauder is a very reputable brand so if you are looking for the perfect night repair serum, consider this one. I received this product in exchange for an honest review courtesy of Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Advanced Night Repair for eyes so I enjoyed trying this product. Great lighter weight consistency- not too thick and heavy. Dries fast and doesn't feel sticky and for me I don't mind the smell.
I really liked this product! I received a sample size through Influenster and It definitely made an impact on my face and my neck lines! I enjoyed it overall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product overall. I have been looking for a night serum. I really liked the texture and feel on my face but it smelled pretty terrible. My husband did not like that part of my night routine. I did notice a brightness to my skin right about when I ran out of my sample. I received a sample from an Influenster campaign.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this serum, however, I still liked it. I’m an Estée Lauder fan, and for the price that it runs, I was expecting maybe more than I should’ve? This serum was nice, it had a smooth feel on the skin upon application. It didn’t have a  strong smell, and it didn’t irritate my skin. There was nothing wrong with the serum, I just wasn’t able to notice much difference with my skin in the time that I used the product. I was given a small sample, and perhaps more time and product was needed in order to notice a difference. It was okay for me. All in all an okay product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this treatment. My skin feels so smooth and like brand new. One of my most fave products in skin routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this nightly for about 2 weeks and it’s been a nice alternate for my normal serum. It makes my skin feel very hydrated and plump after use without weighing it down. The smell is kind of odd and fairly strong but it goes away once the serum sinks in. All in all it’s nice, but I think there are cheaper alternatives that do the job just as well. But keep in mind I’ve only used it for 2 weeks so it will probably take longer to take full effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love all Estee lauder products! This serum is amazing, smooth texture and consistency. Dries fast not leaving skin feeling oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I'm not sure how I feel about this. It's very fragrant, citrusy. And it's a thicker serum than I expected. It seems like it would be very pore clogging if used for a long period of time.  Also, my chin started to break out, which is unusual for my skin lately.  After 2 weeks of use, I didnt see improvement, which normally it takes longer but still.  I doubt I would ever purchase the full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial of this product.. I loved that it was not sticky or thick.. very easy to apply. no strong fragrances. on par with other serums. definitely a luxury item and did not become an essential to my night routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice product, I love the way it felt going onto my skin and how soft and supple my skin was after I used it! I didn’t notice any drastic changes in my skin other than an increase in hydration with my 7 day trial!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels soothing and absorbs into skin very quickly. Doesn’t leave skin feeling sticky or oily. The smell is rather neutral but ultimately I didn’t see a huge difference in my skin and probably wouldn’t spend the money again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this complimentary from influenster. Love this stuff! I’ve always used a version of this even when I was younger... (stolen from my moms beauty products). I do notice a difference on all my blemish scars when I would continuously put this on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly expensive for no benefits to the skin. I saw no increased hydration

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This definitely felt amazing on my face, but it’s crazy expensive. I was lucky enough to try it for free thanks to influenster. It hydrated my skin for sure but being single and tones being crazy I can’t spend that much on face moisturizer right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product. I feel like it made a big difference with my skin. It felt great putting on and not too heavy

reviews.review_title: Need more time and product to determine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest, it was kind of hard to tell if this really did much for my skin, since I was able to try this complimentary with a very small quantity. I will say that each morning, my skin was very hydrated and for the 2 separate weeks I tried this I didn't have dry patches from the retinol I use, and I am assuming thats because of this oil. I think with much longer use this could over all improve the suppleness of my skin, but with such a small quantity it was hard to see that with my initial trial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks on problem areas. Once or twice a week I’ll do my whole face. It feels very nice and makes my skin so smooth. I’m  It sure how this is working for my fine lines, but overall my skin seems even and glows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was not a good product for me. The price is not worth it at all. I used as directed and saw minimal results. Save your money and get other products that do a better job.

reviews.review_title: Acceptable but doesn’t stand out for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to trying this serum, as I’ve tried quite a few others that serve the same purpose. Unfortunately, when I look at the price of this serum compared to others with similar ingredients and skin goals, it really doesn’t hit the mark. That being said, I really enjoyed the feel, scent, and the way this serum made my skin feel. I think it’s average but does not stand out above other similar products that are priced significantly lower. With a try if you’re a fan of the brand, but not the first I’d grab based on competitor serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing compares to this serum! After the first week I noticed my skin was more hydrated and bright. I have slight rosacea and noticed a difference when using this. This serum seemed to help reduce redness. A little goes along way. The application is silky and smooth. My skin does not feel sticky after it’s applied. The packaging is simple, sleek and effective. I love that there is a dropper, not a pump. It is fragrance free and free of sulfates parabens. Since receiving a sample size of this serum I have purchased the full size and use it every night. I have been using this serum for a little over a month now and have noticed major differences in fine lines, brightness, hydration and my rosacea!  I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_title: In like but not in love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I received a week‘s worth of this serum as a sample and to my surprise, it lasted me almost 3 weeks! I did notice instant hydration and my skin felt nice. Obviously, I haven’t been using it long enough to take advantage of the anti-aging effects but I would if I continued. It’s nice for people who prefer a more simple routine. I do like it, but I think I just like other things better.  I’m not sure if I will purchase this serum, but I have enjoyed my sample use! I may consider it in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'll start with the positives: goes on smooth and has a silky finish, has a soft scent (not an unpleasant odor), awesome as a moisturizer, and my skin (which is sensitive) had zero adverse reactions. The negatives: it did absolutely nothing else other than hydrate. I saw no difference in fine lines or wrinkles so for the price, this was not worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product. It was super hydrating and moisturizing it my skin. I have sensitive skin but it did great with this product. I used it every night after a shower and my skin looked dewy and glowy. I would wake up the next morning and my skin would feel, and looked refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product. My skin felt and looked amazing 10/10 would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the skin feels after applying the serum. It doesn’t leave the skin sticky. It goes on very smooth. I usually let it dry for a couple of minutes and apply a moisturizer over it. I immediately noticed my skin feeling more hydrated and plumped. It’s been a few weeks now and I’m starting to see less lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and moisturized, without feeling overly greasy. I can’t say it works for anti-aging, but after a week my skin felt smoother

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product felt very light on the skin once applied, and absorbed nice and quick into my skin. There was no strong smell which I appreciated because I do not like lots of fragrance in my skincare. I receive a 7 day sample for free to test and I did notice an increase in hydration in my skin. My sensitive skin never felt irritated, and the serum, along with my other skincare steps, almost soothed my skin from red to pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I think the product is decent and does give hydration. I used it as they recommended, both on its own and in addition to my regular moisturizer. On its own, it left my skin looking hydrated and glowy but the effect was not long-lasting. It did give a little boost to my skin when paired with my regular moisturizer which lasted slightly longer. While it is a nice product overall, I don’t think I would purchase the full size myself since I currently have other products I can supplement my regular moisturizer with to garner similar results. I received this complimentary from Influenster to test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was scared to try this at first. My skin is so sensitive and usually reacts to everything new that I try. But I was pleasantly surprised by this.. It made my skin super soft and supple feeling. No irritation whatsoever. It was really nice. Does have a weird smell though. Almost reminds me of paint or something, but it fades quickly.. Not sure if I can justify the huge price tag, but it was a nice serum.

reviews.review_title: A new twist on an old classic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a staple in my mother’s routine for quite some time. The company has made some nice adjustments to its formulation but that mainly focuses on hydration. The serum lacks some of the more effective ingredients that target aging. While the serum leaves skin plump and hydrated, I wouldn’t call it “anti-aging”. I think there are cheaper serums on the market that will give you similar results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I don’t think this product is bad, I just don’t think it’s all that. It had a luxurious feel to it when applying and it soaked into the skin right away which I really enjoyed. At first, I thought I was seeing results. But after a while, my skin went back to looking like it’s normal self. I’m not sure if my skin got used to it or if it’s not exactly what my skin needs, but I don’t think I would purchase myself. I received this complimentary from Influenster to test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this for a week and thought it was pretty decent. Not too greasy and it was lightweight. Skin felt soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled really good but didn’t feel like it really did much for my skin. It also left a little residue that would rub off once the serum dried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small one-week sample of this to review and I have no complaints. It felt so good on my skin and hydrated nicely! I am picky about how serums and creams feel on my skin and was a bit concerned at first since it was a little thick, but it felt a great and not sticky or gross at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great product, it definitely does moisturize your skin but for the price of the product I almost expected it to do more.... I do love the easiness to apply and how soft it makes your face however I feel like there are other alternatives that might not cost half of what this does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my face feel soft; helped with dryness. It didn’t irritate my skin either despite having sensitive skin. I received a sample complimentary from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a one week supply of this serum complimentary for reviewing purposes from Influenster. I have combination skin that tends to be sensitive. I did not experience any redness, irritation, or breakouts using this serum and actually felt that it moisturized very nicely without making my skin oily. It absorbed well and surprisingly I felt like my skin felt firmer and healthier. I would absolutely add this into my routine as I feel it is truly effective for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this. works great with my other skincare items. Leaves my skin looking glowy and hydrated. Hate the price lol

reviews.review_title: Baby soft skin at the age of 50!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my mature skin very supple and soft. didn't use it long enough to notice any fine lines or wrinkles disappearing however the softness alone was worth the try.

reviews.review_title: Necessary part of my nightly routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a fan of Estée Lauder, with the one exception of this product.   Before I start, I’m in my 40s and am constantly seeking ways to fight signs of aging. While I get occasional acne, my primary focus is reducing the wear and tear of life, kids and sun exposure back when we all thought tanning was a great idea.  It’s a great lightweight serum, it’s measured out for you so there’s no guessing, and it soaks into the skin really well. This is one of the few products I’d suggest taking before and after photos when using. You’ll see a difference.  I had a friend who worked in a department store who sold Estée Lauder and was in her 50s. She used the demo for this product on her hand every day, and left her other hand without any treatment. In a month there was a visible difference! Ever since then, I’ve kept this little gem in my skincare bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was just ok. For the price, I would’ve expected it to do more. I did notice a slight difference, but not any more than my drugstore products. Maybe you have to use it longer to get more results, but I wasn’t all that impressed.

reviews.review_title: You dont want to miss out on this one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes. This is the first time I have ever used one of  Estee Lauder's face care products. When applying the product felt velvety and smooth. It absorbed in to my skin quite nicely and did not leave my skin feeling greasy. I can't really speak on long term results as this bottle did not last that long. My only concern would be the price. I would recommend others to give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my skin feel extra hydrated and bright in the mornings!  I really enjoyed the glow it gives my skin and that it does not make me break out. Great for when your skin feels neglected. I would be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from influenster. I love the ingredients, it’s like an all in one serum. It’s light and doesn’t leave your skin sticky! My skin looks brighter after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! I can definitely tell it helped smooth out some of my lines and it made my skin look better! I received it for free for testing purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin, and this product did not break me out. I only received a sample so I can't say if it smooths out fine lines. It did make my skin soft though. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster and I love it. I definitely will be buying a full sized bottle soon. My skin feels amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this product as I have been looking for a new recovery serum! The texture on my skin was very nice and not overly greasy. However, after using it for a few weeks I did begin to breakout a bit, so this may just not be a great fit for my combo/oily skin! I would definitely recommend for dryer skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice product, but it feels like any other serum. I goes on well on the skin and soaks in quick, but I haven’t seen any major changes in my skin. I would not purchase this simple because of the price tag. I feel that there are other serums that give the same feel for a much more reasonable price. I will say though, it lasts pretty well, I got a sample size and use it on all my face, neck, and chest, and still have some left over. However, I did not use it every night back to back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice product to try. The sample size was to small to convince me it was worth the price tag because I didn’t see a big change in just a week use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice product, it felt nice on my skin and wasn’t very greasy. I did break out a little bit a few days in, but it cleared up. I don’t know if it’s worth the expensive price tag, but I would be interested to see what difference it would make long term.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a great serum! It isn’t greasy or overly sticky but is thick enough to get the job done!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a week now and I’ve noticed how much my skin improved. I wear it every night and my fave feels smoother and no defined lines. I’ve been receiving compliments on my skin care rerun

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed my fine lines shrinking ever so slightly. Absorbs well and is hydrating. Didn’t make me break out for my sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: received free sample! I liked this product! It made my skin feel very soft instantly after use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have been using it for several weeks and my skin looks amazing. It feels great on my skin and smells awesome. It soaks in nicely and doesn’t feel greasy at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the feel of this serum, but given the sample size it’s hard to see any results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE and cannot live without it! It spreads easily and absorbs quickly. I wake up in the morning with glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item as a sample in exchange for a review, but I've already used it even prior to the gifting. This serum is great for night time skincare! It’s a bit expensive but it really does work, it leaves my skin feeling so plump and healthy in the morning. Ive noticed it also helps clear away some of my scarring. I’ve even purchased this as holiday gifts for family members before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using it two evenings I noticed a change in my skin. It made my skin soft and supple. It reduced my fine lines and smelled great! I will repurchase this in the large size because it really works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product! My skin was noticeably brighter after using and I loved the way it felt! I received this product complimentary for testing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product so-so. It’s great for overnight hydration, but I did not notice any other benefits advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the frangance and the texture! not oily at all i use this every night after creanser and before mousturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this procuct for free from Influenster for testing purposes, and I promise to give my honest opinion. I love this product so much!! ! I really was nervous becuase I have extremely, extremely sensitive skin, but it worked amazingly! I am 28, I am starting to see some fine lines and I swear this made them less visible! I feel like for the first time trying something like this, I could actually visibly see a difference!! It made my skin look healthier, and just better! I especially noticed my smile lines are so much less visible now. This product doesn’t have any added fragrance which is great. At first it has a slight smell from whatever is in it, but it quickly dissipated. It’s super lightweight you can’t feel it on your skin at all once you rub it in. I put my moisturizer right over it with no problems at all! It soaks into the skin so so well. I saw results within a week of using it! My skin definitely looks more supple and radiant since incorporating this into my daily routine. I usually absolutely hate serums because they don’t do a thing to my skin, but I’m so excited to purchase this on my own (even though it’s very pricey!) because it’s so awesome and I highly recommend it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receieved this for free for my honest review. I didnt notice a difference in my fine lines but works amazing as a moisturizer. Left my skin super smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didnt get rid of my fine lines but it was super moisturizing and smoothed my skin! Im acne prone and it didnt break me out. I loved using it but it didnt do much for my wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex is excellent. repairs the firmness of the skin in a short time.  my skin looks fresher and smoother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very iffy on this one... I do like the consistency and the way it makes my skin feel after. The odor is a bit off the mark. Although, I did not see much of a difference after using it for a few weeks straight. And for the price, I wouldn’t be able to afford going longer and having to buy more to see if it works. I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did have somewhat of a different odor than the older version. That being said, I do still feel like it’s a great product and left my skin looking and feeling much better after only using for 1 week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample in an order and was able to use it over 3 nights. While I didn’t use it long enough to see any visible benefits, it was light and not at all greasy, and left my skin hydrated with a matte finish. I have incredibly sensitive skin and did not react at all. The price is the only real downside otherwise I would probably purchase a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the consistency of this product a lot. It’s extremely lightweight and not greasy at all. It goes on my skin easily and it absorbs onto my skin easily. The only downside is I don’t like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster to test it out. This was an okay product for me. It didn’t have a strong scent and had a nice light texture but I didn’t notice much difference with my skin. Either the product wasn’t suitable for me or I needed more product and time to test it out longer. I didn’t notice breakouts or irritation with this but everything is ymmv so if this looks like something you want to try, check the ingredients first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good to add in to your nighttime routine. I definitely noticed an improvement in the texture of my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t noticed any kind of difference in my skin since I’ve started using this. It also made my skin feel very oily, which I was not a fan of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super luxe! I had a week’s worth of this product as a sample, and I used it to the last drop. My face felt super soft and smooth while using this serum. I want to purchase a full size and see what results I’ll get long term. This was wonderful on my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary for review purposes. I was excited because it’s a higher end product. It did not meet my expectations and although you need 3 weeks to see results versus the sample I received I feel it just made my skin break out more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll start by saying I received this product complimentary from influenster in exchange for my review. I really wanted to love this product. I saw results very fast. Considering they only gave me a 7 day supply I tried to stretch it out and see if I could get the full 3 weeks out of it that it says will lead to results. After a few days my skin was so soft and bright. It made me wonder why I never thought I needed a brightening serum before. My skin was full and healthy looking. I loved it. But after a little over two weeks my skin started to itch. And my nose broke out in little red bumps because my skin was irritated. Not sure if it was this or my bee lip moisturizer but I had to stop using it just in case to let the irritation die down

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product. Use it everyday, keep my skin stable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product leaves for a cool, sticky glow that I have mixed emotions about. I definitely feel the nourishment both immediately after applying and in the mirror when I wakeup the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this product and used it every night or every other night after washing my face. It felt fine on my face, just like any other serum. In the morning I didn’t feel a huge difference. I have dry skin and I had high expectations for this product that weren’t really met. I wouldn’t say no to it but I wasn’t any more impressed with it than other products I’ve used for a cheaper price. Maybe if you use the product for a longer period of time you’d see better results, I just didn’t see any benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start out by saying thank you @influenster for sending me this #complimentary product to try out & review! This is the first time I have ever tried a Estée Lauder product and I am pleasantly surprised at how well the serum is working. A little goes a long way! It has helped reduce the appearance of my fine lines and wrinkles and helped smooth my textured skin. Most serums leave me looking oily but this one has not. My skin looks way more vibrant and less red. It’s a great product and definitely worth the money!! #GenerationANR #contest #esteelauder

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was always been a little dry after receiving and using this product for a week I noticed my skin was more hydrated, felt softer, and looked more even. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is effective in maintaining soft and healthy skin. My skin is pretty good already so I didn’t see any crazy changes but it seemed to keep my skin soft and smooth after I wash everything off in the morning. I mostly use it at night but sometimes as a morning serum too. The smell is a lil weird but not too offputting. It is a little tacky to use but I get over it. I think it works fine but it definitely is pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice product... it really helped with inflammation of the skin and helped with overall texture. I felt like I needed a lot kore product than my current serum, but overall it was nice... didn’t cause breakout in my acne prone skin and wasn’t greasy or sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample size of this product in exchange for my honest review. I have oily, maturing, acne-prone skin. I used the serum for about a week, and noticed that my skin felt softer. It did not leave a greasy residue or break me out. I'm not sure it's worth the price, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a week size trial of this serum. It goes on so smoothly, no bad scent, absorbs quickly into the skin. I loved everything about it except that for some reason it didnt agree with my skin. I seem to be an exception with this but i got tiny white heads from it each time.  They were nothing serious and went away by the next day. Other than that I thought it was great. I think it must’ve just been reacting with another serum i use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: EL really met expectations this time. Absorbs very quickly into skin.  Silky smooth skin.  Pleasant scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a smaller 7 day sample of this and I was impressed. I didn't care for the smell too much however it quickly faded. In the second day of applying it at night I noticed smoother skin. I have light scarring and I did notice a slight improvement in those areas. If a 7 day same did this I can't wait to see what a full size and longer application would do to my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample so I tested only for a week, I liked the texture, very light and it absorbs fast. The skin feels very soft and smooth. I can’t tell much about helping with fine lines and all bc I used only for a week. But I ll buy in the future to try for longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well but after reading the ingredients and what this serum does it’s really just an overpriced hyaluronic acid. You can certainly get something much cheaper for the same outcome. If you got money to spend then go for it because it’s still super nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this with one of my purchases a little while ago. I've been using it for just a few days now and my skin looks and feels amazing. My face has been extra dry from wearing masks and this serum restores it over night! It's even helped keep my acne under control. I'll be buying the normal size as soon as I finish this sample bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so/so. For the price I would say it’s not worth it. While I love Estée Lauder this is more of a pass for me. It smells slightly strange kind of like old flowers and is extremely oily- for me my skin broke out! I have sensitive skin so this for me was just a no! Might be better for someone with more of a dry skin not oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I generally think of nightcreams as subpar when it comes time to being moisturizing. This one was perfection. It was light enough I didn’t even know it was on, and didn’t leave an oil slick on my face the next day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum was super hydrating but that was about it. It didn’t really reduce any dullness or fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes and was really excited when I received it free to try from Influenster but it really did not do anything for me. I saw no difference good or bad. The scent also wasn’t for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good everyday serum especially for sensitive skin. It added a layer of nice hydration that sunk into the skin well. I like the texture of it (jelly like), I like the results and I like the packaging. I haven’t used it long enough but so far it’s been great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used up the tiniest bottle of this serum and I have to admit, it was lovely. It’s feels so nice on your skin and a wonderful addition to my nighttime skincare routine. However, if you’re looking for a skincare miracle (as I typically am), this is not your product ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as complimentary from influenster and I started using this product every day since I got it. At first, I wasn't seeing any results but then I started noticing the results of my face, it does appear to be a lot more refreshed and brighter. I would recommend using this product every night so you could see better results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from influenster and I was so excited to try it! I used it for a week and I honestly didn’t see too much improvement. It did improve texture but didn’t help with acne much. It is not scented and dries quickly on the skin. I probably wouldn’t purchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. Every night that I used it,  I woke up to healthy, radiant looking skin. I found that this serum absorbed very quickly into my skin and didn't leave a sticky feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product compliments of Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I was definitely excited to try this product out as I love Estee Lauder products and they are always of the highest quality. This serum is no different. It has a light citrusy scent that dissipates relatively quickly. The serum applies easily and a little goes a long way. For me, my skin remained tacky for a couple seconds as the product soaked in. Afterwards, my skin felt supple and moisturized. Usually I need to apply a thick night cream before bed but this surprisingly provided more than enough moisture for me. My skin looks healthy and a bit dewy, but most importantly it looks healthy! The biggest downside to this product is the price. Would reccomend if price is no issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes but all opinions are my own.  This serum is scent free and dries quickly on the skin. My skin was hydrated upon applying it but I usually applied a heavier cream over it since I'm a dryer skin type. I noticed my skin looked less dry and a slight improvement of its texture after a week of consistent use. Overall, I would recommend this product for anyone with mature skin or anyone looking to boost their skin routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Smells amazing and a little bit goes along way. It doesn’t irritate or bother my skin and it’s very light on the skin. I would definitely recommend it to everyone to try. I received this item complimentary to review from Influcenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great serum, oily at first but not when it dries. I received a complimentary one week trial to monitor changes in my skin. Overall, skin texture improved and I'm curious to see what happens if I integrate this into my nightcare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so impressed with this serum. It goes on smoothly and layers well with other products. My skin has been struggling now and again due to wearing a face mask and shield all day as a healthcare worker. Keeping up with my good skincare routine has greatly helped my skin stay vibrant and clear. The only downside to this product was that it does have a kind of herbal scent to it that I wasn’t crazy about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a good serum. Feels good on. Didn’t irritate my skin and absorbs nicely. It doesn’t feel oily after it dries either. I received a sample from Influenster to try out but opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the mini size to try out and did not see any changes in my fine lines. Other similar products that I have used before worked way better than this. It does an ok job I suppose and maybe this worked better for other people. It just didnt do anything for me. If you have the means, I would say to try the mini size bedore taking the plunge on a full sized bottle since this is pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first heard of this product from one of my mother’s friends who has beautiful skin. Then I received a sample from Influenster. I have to say I truly enjoyed how it made my skin feel. It makes my skin soft and I feel it is work at preventing aging. I enjoyed it so much that I have already brought a full sized one. I am adding this to my daily skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample to test out for a week. My skin started to look better just after a few days! A little goes a long way with this product. My uneven skin tone around my chin started to look better and my skin felt healthier all around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Left my skin feeling hydrated, but I found that I woke up feeling oily. I definitely didn’t see enough improvement in my skin to justify the price. Perhaps if you had REALLY dry skin this would be more helpful for you, but I’m in the middle and it left me feeling like I had to wash my face first thing. I received a complimentary sample from Influenster in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this night serum! The formula is fantastic, and my skin felt better. I would recommend this product. I received it for free in exchange for my honest review from. Influencer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this but it broke me out the first night. I’m so happy it was complimentary and I didn’t have to pay for it.

reviews.review_title: Nice but maybe not worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice product! It is very luxurious feeling and hydrated very well. But at the end of the day, it is just a hydrating product. I did not notice any crazy improvements to my skin that would make it worth spending a ton or money on. If money is not an issue, or of you really want to treat yourself, go for it. But you can get similar effects with less expensive hydrating serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been breaking out not sure if it’s from this or from something else. I stopped using the product. I did receive this product free to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if it was my skin type but I broke out as soon as I started using it. I received this to try out and unfortunately I had to stop using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: actually I love this serum, it has a citrus scent and it makes your skin SHINE. Your skin does absorb a good amount so you got to get a good amount of product on. It’s a little on the pricey side but it’s totally worth it! I got this as a promo gift but I will be purchasing more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in sample size to try. It’s a nice serum but I didn’t notice much of a benefit to it. I would probably just look into another serum that’s more effective for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for over a year now and I love it! My face is super soft and it’s great for my sensitive skin! Influenster sent me a small sample to review but this is a product I’ve been using and will continue to!

reviews.review_title: Hydrating but not meant for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complementary from influenster. I was happy to try this product out the past two weeks, once a day. It is the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum • I used this everyday in the morning. It sat well under makeup and it’s packed with hyaluronic acid so if you live an a humid environment and you have dehydrated and dry skin this will be so special for you. It was almost too hydrating for me at times but if you’re really dry and dehydrated this is ideal. If you don’t live in an environment with moisture in the air the hyaluronic acid in this product can actually do more bad than good and dehydrate your skin even more. • I see no anti-aging affects but I do think you will notice a more youthful look to your skin when using this because it’s meant to add hydration to your skin that you may be missing which “plumps” your skin. • I do think as I get older this is a product I’ll have to keep in mind as my skin changes and doesn’t hold as much water and hydration in the skin as easy. It is expensive but it think the results can be worth it for your skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good! Definitely will purchase again. Helped my skin tremendously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for testing purposes and love it! It does not leave your face sticky like other serums. Also, it has little to no scent which I also really enjoy. Usually scented product make my eyes water or the scent lingers on me all day. My skin has definitely felt a lot more smooth and looked more radiant. I recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have fallen in love with this serum after only a week. I got this product for free to try in a trial size and I want more! I even used this on my neck and saw a huge difference in my skin there as well.

I may be purchasing this for myself once I’m back to work because I think it’s worth every penny!

I did notice that what I put makeup on it seems to have helped my texture form my pores be less noticeable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free week sample from Influenster. I think it’s an ok serum. It didn’t add too much to my skincare routine but it did boost my hyaluronic serum a bit. I can’t talk about long term because I used the sample for about 2 weeks, it lasted a little longer than the 1 week sample. It did add a glow to my skin as well. I hated the scent, it smells like pain thinner but the scent isn’t too much, I’m sensitive to scent and it automatically went away once rubbed in. I don’t think I’d purchase the actual product because the price is a little high and I didn’t see much to justify it. I’d say if you don’t already have a hyaluronic acid and an anti aging serum I think this would work great. Good product overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve got to be honest, I’ve never really used Estée Lauder, maybe a sample here or there. After a week my skin tone was def more evened out - after day 11, skin tone is noticeably evening out, fine lines diminished, skin is plumper and the melasma around my mouth from my pregnancies is gone. NO PRODUCT HAS EVER EVENED OUT MY SKIN TONE OR REMOVED MY MELASMA!!! I thought I had to just accept it. This is it for me, converted!   (P.S, just because I received a deluxe sample complementary sways my reviews 0. This stuff is legit)
