reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is LIFE CHANGING! I did get a sample from Influenster and omgoshhhh even my husband, supporters from fb has noticed a change in my skin in just one week!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff has been great for my skin. I’m a lover of all things skin care, mainly because I’ve had tons of problems with acne, rosacea and melasma, however Over the years I’ve learned how to be good to my skin so it will be good to me. I recently got this complimentary serum to try out and review, and after a week, I have to say I’m impressed! My skin is not as dry. Which mean the hyaluronic acid is helping me stay moisturized! Which I love. My complexion looks smoother and even and this is after only using for a week. So far I’d highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product! Left my skin feeling great and wasn’t too thick or heavy feeling. Had my mom try it too (I am 30, she’s 50) and she loved it as well. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum! Goes on very smooth and gives me glowing skin in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum. Felt amazing on my skin and left my skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very nice. It has a nice smell and doesn't irritate my skin ... but I didn’t see much change in my skin over the course if the week trail I received. I'm guessing a little longer use would show better results. The product is very nice!

reviews.review_title: Gave me acne and dried me out.  No thanks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out all over my chin and made my skin feel super tight and dry.  Love having the opportunity to sample products through Influenster, but this was a swing and a miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hydrated my skin. It’s a lightweight serum and it blends into the skin well. My skin looked radiant.

reviews.review_title: Does what it's supposed to do
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly cant tell the difference between serums these days. Nothing too special about any of them. This one seems to do like it says.... my skin felt tighter and smoother. My pores werent as noticible and my skin generally looked more youthful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good product that may make a difference over time, but so far I cannot notice much. I do like the feeling on my skin, it feels light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly it didn’t really do much for me. I didn’t like the smell. If this wasn’t complementary I would never buy it. It does go on smooth but I haven’t seen  any significant improvement in my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This goes on really smoothly and leaves my skin feeling hydrated. It has a nice, light scent. I can't speak to any real benefits, though. I have yet to see an improvement in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice product. It goes on very smoothly, is not sticky, feels light, and leaves my skin glowing. I haven’t seen any specific improvements in my skin since using, but so far I like it a lot and am looking forward to future results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product! Leaves the skin feeling nice and hydrated. I use it only at night. It has a lovely scent, not too strong, very fresh. I can’t say it helped with any signs of aging but it did leave me skin very smooth and moisturized after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. I’ve tried so many night time serums and they just broke me out and I just never have like them but this one is so comfortable and not sticky I love it so much! I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum was not sticky at all. I loved how it made my skin look when I woke up in the morning! This is something I never would have tried if it wasn’t for the gift from Influenster. I’m glad I was introduced to this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t speak to the efficacy of it because my skin is very prone to breakouts/sensitivity and with the PEGs in this and my past use of Estes lauder products, I had to pass. A patch test confirmed since my skin itched

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the texture and feel of the product but unfortunately it made me breakout after just a few uses. The idea behind this product and what it does is great but it’s not for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product, but unfortunately it made me break out. It felt so soft on my face and actually helped with some discoloration, but after I started using, I began getting a bunch of small pimples.

reviews.review_title: Causes acne and not much else
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks, Influenster for the complimentary Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum.  I’ve been using this sample for two weeks and, unfortunately, the only difference I see is the resulting acne.  The texture and feel is just fine and it smells like a multi-vitamin, so I wouldn’t hesitate to use it if I had a large enough sample to see results and it didn’t cause acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great serum. Since I started using this the pores and fine lines on my face have disappeared more. Most of all I like that it makes your skin have a very natural healthy glow to it. It also makes your skin very soft. I would definitely spend the money to buy the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oldie but goodie! Just because your mom has used it for years doesn’t mean it’s not worth a try. This serum is packed full of antioxidants that don’t clog your pores. It’s great for all skin types. I still feel like the price point is a tiny bit high for the size but it’s tried and true. It’s lastwd this long because it works! Give it a whirl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great serum that helped remove discoloration and blemishes from my face. I saw the best results using the serum twice a day instead of just at night. Helped reduce the appearance of wrinkles without making my face feel greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a night serum for sensitive skin this would be a good option. It never made my skin feel irritated nor did I get any acne with it. It absorbed into my skin almost immediately. Sometimes I felt like I needed more it soaked in so fast. Never sticky. I didn’t really notice any changes in my skin through

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my skin look so wonderful. I received a sample of it via Influenster and I am so happy that I did. My skin looks and feels so wonderful. The morning after using it for the first time I noticed how much brighter and smoother my skin looked. I am in love with this product. It has made such a massive difference in the appearance of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I received a small sample size from an Influenster Box and was so excited to try it out. The product had a strong scent but it did not bother me because I felt like it was working for the short amount of time I used it. It has an oily feel but it soaked in slowly throughout the night. I really want to buy the bigger bottle for myself now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil has completely gotten rid of my terrible dry itches around my T-zone. I have been using this a little over a month and have been very satisfied with the results. I definitely will be purchasing this after I am finished with this little guy :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to test out for 7 days. At the start I was hesitant about using just another product that may not work, after consistently using this for 7 days my skin feels so revived and smooth. The smell is great and applying it to your face feels amazing. Dries within a minute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been very pleased with this product so far. I received a one week sample for an honest review and while that is not a lot of time to see major changes, I did not have any negative side effects. I have extremely sensitive skin and have a hard time finding products that do not break me out. The Advanced Night Repair has no perfume scent and leaves my skin feeling soft. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with sensitive skin issues.

reviews.review_title: A good serum, but not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My grandmother and mother swear by estee lauder. My grandmother's skin looked 20 years younger in her 70s mostly due to her good EL skincare. However, while this product works well, I didn't find it made much of a difference in 7 days, which is the trial size they sent me. It rubbed in well, didn't smell, and didn't break me out, but I didn't notice any major changes. Maybe if I had used it for a full 3 months or more, but I don't have $100 to dish out on serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. A little goes a long way and I absolutely feel like it helps my combination skin feel much smoother and softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive the 7 day free trial to try . I love how it feels on the skin and made my dry skin feel moisture and soft. I did not see much of a different in the 7day trial but i think if I extend using it for 3 months it wouldve shown difference . It is not tacky on the face and absorbs really well on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I able to use this product for one week, and it didn't work for me. It broke me out where  I used it. It doesnt have a great smell either, but once you put it on your face, the smell goes away. Overall, if it doesn't break you out, it might work great for you. I recommend trying a sample first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It made my face feel super soft and silky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a tiny free sample to try out for a week. I definitely noticed a difference in my skin, especially in the mornings. Usually my skin would be kinda greasy and loose, but if I used this at night my skin was more hydrated and tight feeling. The only thing I didn’t particularly like was the smell of it, but that was only as I was applying it. I’m new to serums, but I would definitely recommend this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am glad that I was able to use this serum for one week. I definitely noticed a change in my skin after using it. My skin was softer and more hydrated. One thing, though is the smell of the serum. At first, the smell isn't the best but after it being applied you don't even smell it. I definitely recommend adding this serum to you night routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m disappointed to say, this product just didn’t work for me. The serum left my skin feeling sticky & caused breakouts on the areas I applied it to. After one week of use, I saw no results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I liked this night time serum. It was very lightweight and didn’t leave my skin feeling greasy like some serums do. I am not a huge fan of the initial smell of this but it dissipates quickly and is not noticeable after applying my nightly moisturizer. I received the sample size for testing purposes so I used it for just a little over a week straight can’t say I noticed a huge difference in my skin but it did seem more hydrated in the morning. I would recommend this if you are looking for a serum to add to your night time routine however for me it is a little to high of a price point for me to justify purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Left my skin feeling nice and supple after the first week of use. It mixed well with the rest of my skin care products when other serums I've tried haven't always mixed well. The only thing I really didn't like was the scent. It was a strong chemical like scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This item is amazing leave my face super Smoth and it dries fast

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this serum. I mostly use around my eyes for wrinkles. It's nice and light feeling. There isn't a scent, which makes me happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always love Estee lauder products. Well made. My skin feels soft and better after using for a few weeks

reviews.review_title: Good for skin, bad for acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my skin feel plump and full, but as I have acne breakouts it unfortunately doesn’t do much to help with that. Not that I expected it to, it just doesn’t mix well with my acne products and aggravates any current breakouts further- my face will sting after I apply it if I accidentally rub it into an invisible zit.  If you want dewy, supple, moisturized skin this is perfect for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for testing purposes and it was quite the small sample so I can’t really speak to it changing my skin in any way but I will say I did like how it melts into the skin and leaves it feeling nice and plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Soo good! I used a sample of it and at the time I had a few imperfections and acne scars and just after a week of using it my face was sooo smooth and my ance scars diminished. I am super impressed. I am now considering paying the $100 for it!

reviews.review_title: this is not as good as previous edition
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate this edition....it doesn’t as previous formula. I apply it every night after double cleanse and it doesn’t do but anything but breaks my skin. I uses the previous edition for more than a year. I had glowing, healthy, hydrated skin every morning. It used to be my fav!! But this one....ugh with overhyped  hyaluronic acid formula. it has been a month that i tried this one and it breaks my skin. Not a fan and not wasting my money on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product absorbs quickly and leaves no oily residue. My skin feels soft and plump in the morning after applying it the night before. Have noticed a smoother /blurr look around my cheek area(it’s where my skin is textured the most) . and it hasent dried out my forehead, which is what gets really dry and flaky. You don’t need a lot of product to get full coverage and their is little to no smell at all .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial size free and my skin is fairly sensitive which I did end up breaking out while using it. Although that happens when using new product for me. I did think it would get better but being only trial sized I wasn’t able to get the full result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary of Influenster for testing. When using my skin has been left looking radiant and glowing, the fine lines around my eyes look less noticeable for a few days but seem to be just as prominent after a few days. In addition my face is left very shiny, though not oily.  Overall I think it works well, and with a few tweaks I can manage the shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good serum, but I need to use it a little longer to really see if it makes much difference. It smells nice and runs in well. Doesn't leave you feeling sticky. I would like the bottle better if it had a pump on it though. I got this product for free to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum makes my skin look amazing. It cleared up my acne, and it helped brighten my skin and get rid of redness! My skin looks super healthy!

reviews.review_title: Will add to face care regime!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size from Influenster and although it was a small amount, I did start to notice differences right away. I'm sure after prolonged use, these differences would increase. Great for my dry skin and reduced my forehead lines a bit after just a couple of days. Light scent, goes on smoothly and only need a little to cover face. Glowing skin and softer lines were the biggest differences after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample but unfortunately it was too small to actually try it and give a good review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This night repair complex is great for my dry skin that works overnight and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and healthy when I wake. It’s not harsh, not strong smelling, and easily is applied. It absorbs nicely but leaves skin feeling soft and moisturized. I did receive this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product thanks to Influenster & Estée Lauder! I have been trying this gem for about 3 weeks now. I can say I have been liking the results it has given me. It claims to strengthen the skin barrier in 4 hours and 72-hour hydration with Hyaluronic Acid. It has definitely gives me that instant glow right after applying it along with my other products in my skincare routine. I love using it during my makeup application. I have dry skin and I find that this helps my foundation apply much smoother and no dry patches. As an Esthetician I approve of this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my skin feels in the morning after using this! I haven’t noticed a huge difference as it’s a trial size, but I can definitely tell my skin is more hydrated. I can’t say I’ll repurchase but I like the product.

reviews.review_title: A solid serum for maturing skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my mid thirties and this is a workhorse of a serum. Does it cure your flaws overnight? No, but from a short amount of time using this I can tell a difference in skin texture. You definitely should only use this at night as it works it can increase redness or a plumped feeling. I greatly enjoy and would recommend this to anyone with aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This felt amazing from day 1. It has been two weeks now and my skin is more clear, even, and radiant. My red T zone has gotten so much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love estee lauder serum formula. I have been using the serum for few weeks now and already impressed by the new product. Used as night time serum it helps to recover my Dry skin and make it smooth and plump. It sink into the skin quickly not leaving any sticky feeling.i love that the formula is effective and makes my skin feel and look good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so, I used this product regularly for a week and I definitely did notice an improvement in my skin by the end of the week. It was not like a super dramatic change or anything, but my skin felt softer, looked healthier and seemed smoother when I was putting on my makeup in the morning. If you have okay skin and would like to give it a boost of moisture, this is a great option for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for one night and immediately fell in love! It doesn’t really have a scent (I don’t like products with overwhelming smells) and it leaves my face bright without feeling/looking oily like a lot of serums I’ve tried! [I received this product free for reviewing purposes]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complementary and I really enjoy it. It leaves my skin feeling super smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the product it was really good for my skin tried it every day for a month and saw amazing results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is very light, but feels amazing on the skin! A little goes a long way. I can’t say if it made a huge difference with my skin, but it does feel lovely and the smell is light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product! Thanks for Influenster sending me this complimentary to test. My skin however wasn’t the best fit. It feels very soft and silky upon application. But due to mask wearing it irritated the skin on my lower face. Pre masks this would have been a great addition to my skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really was not thrilled with this product at all. I did not notice that much of a difference at all with my skin. I feel that this product is very expensive, so I was expecting more results from it. I received a sample size for free for trial purposes, but i would definitely not purchase it or recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has tightened and firmed so much so quickly. I see a significant difference in my skin and it’s been so nice to see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this feels on the skin it’s light weight, it penetrates right away makes it easy to apply other products on the skin without waiting for the product to set. I feel like after using it for a while my skin looks better and my fun lines look less noticeable. I recommend this product. I did receive this complimentary from influenster to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this serum feels on the skin! Unfortunately after a few days of using it on my whole face I noticed some irritation and beginnings of acne on my forehead, but I continued to use it under the eyes and on the nasolabial folds and noticed an improvement of my skin texture and fine lines. I also let my mom use it and she didn’t have any irritation so it’s probably just my skin. I think it’s a great serum for smoothing wrinkles and lines, but I’d have to test it for a longer period of time to see if it actually boosts collagen production and diminishes pores like advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was super gentle on my skin and helped keep it moisturized. However, I did not notice a huge difference in it helping my skin issues however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I liked this product more than I did! This product was overall a little ‘blah’ for me. Fortunately it didn’t break me out or cause any serious skin issues for me, which can be an issue as I have very sensitive dry skin. But I don’t think it made a significance either, and for the price tag I would expect my skin to feel radiant and rejuvenated. Overall it wasn’t bad, but I don’t think I would repurchase either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually these kinds of products have a strong scent, but this one doesn't have a scent. It's doesn't sit on my skin and you don't need a lot. My skin had an instant little glow and felt amazing the longer I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for over a week I’ve definitely noticed that this does help my combo skin . My mid 40s skin feels toned and tightened when using the serum . The scent is Pleasant and light . I feel this is moisturizing and absorbs right into the skin I felt it was important to share a photo without any make up for those to see how well this product works .  I think the most important thing to get good results with this product is to use it every day faithfully.  I also noticed the dark circles under my eyes disappeared .

reviews.review_title: Good, but not for super dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is okay, but not the best. It doesn't really sink into the skin which is a good and bad thing. It means it's not greasy, but it means you have to put on a couple layers, which is what I had to do. It did  after a couple weeks make my face feel soft, but often I felt like it was still dry when I woke up, which is really weird. My skin did go through a little bit of a purge phase, so beware. Other then that it's okay, does a good job, but for my skin I need something that sinks in and is way more hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was sent to me. I like this serum better than the original! The hyaluronic acid in it is extremely hydrating. The texture of the serum is very smooth. I’ve been using this 7 days straight after my toner and before my moisturizer, and my skin looks healthier. A little goes a long way. I warm a few drops between my fingers then I pay it all over my face. I will definitely be purchasing a full size to add to my nightly skincare routine. Definitely getting the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for my honest review. I have combination, sensitive skin and this product made me breakout. I thought because it was just a weeks worth of product it would not be enough to see results but I started breaking out after just 3 days of use. I would not recom this product if you are like me

reviews.review_title: Very silky texture! Smooth and Hydrated!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free weeks worth sample size of the Night Repair Serum for testing purposes . Just from the short amount of time using it I could tell my face felt more hydrated after use. My normal daily moisturizer mixed well with the Serum as well, my makeup went on smoother when I used the serum in the morning, it also did not effect the wear of my makeup. The smell was very pleasant! The texture is very silky, left my face feeling very smooth once applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I complimentary received a travel size of this product. I did try it for a week and I liked it. It says it is a Night Repair Serum, however it can be used at day. I did used both times but definitely I could see more work at night. My skin felt hydrated. It doesn't let any residue and if I liked I could use it as a primer for my makeup. I put 4 starts because even though isn't have any strong smell it has some and that isn't my favorite, however it goes away very fast. The texture of the product is amazing, I think people with all skin type could use it.  I will recommend you to try this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product to be mostly odorless, not too thick not too thin, and not greasy like some other serums and oils. While using this product for about 2 weeks at night only I have not noticed a difference in my skin. I didn’t have any issues with how the serum felt on my skin or have any negative effects like breakouts; however, considering the price, and my neutral results, I wouldn’t recommend this product to a friend or buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite thing about this serum is how glowy it leaves my skin. It’s definitely hydrating, but it doesn’t clog my pores. Other hyaluronic acid serums I’ve used have left my face tacky. This serum has a smooth texture that soaks in nicely, and leaves my face feeling plump. My only complaint is that using this serum in my nighttime routine during the hotter months, leaves my combination skin oilier in the morning then I prefer. My skin gets very easily shinny during the summer, so for someone with my skin type, I suggest using this serum in the drier months when the extra hydration is necessary.   I cannot speak of the anti-aging benefits for this serum. Aging is not one of my skin concerns, yet. However, I can see how it would do a nice job of plumping fine lines, thanks to the hyaluronic acid. After using this serum for two weeks, the only real lasting result I saw was hydration. My skin is always glowy and healthy looking in the morning after using this in my nighttime routine. If you do want to use this product for the anti-aging benefits, I suggest purchasing the full size. The smaller option lasted me two weeks, since I am petite and have a smaller face. For most people, it only lasted them one week. Which, of course, wouldn’t give you the full results from a skincare product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product cause it make your face feel hydrated and soft when you apply it

I’ve used several, and I didn’t see a noticeable difference with this one and some others at a lower price point. It’s light and goes on smooth. The scent is a little odd, but not intolerable. It does moisturize well, and my skin still felt moisturized in the mornings. You only need a small amount, so maybe it would last a bit, but I didn’t see a difference enough to justify the cost

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample of this skin serum to review and it has been a wonderful skin product to add to my nightly skin routine. I apply after cleansing and toning my face and I feel like my skin is just thirsty for this product. It absorbs super quickly which actually made it a little hard to spread so I feel like I had to use a good amount of product to cover my face. It has a light citrusy scent which didn’t bother me at all. My skin felt more soft and hydrated the days I used the product and I felt my makeup went on smoother the morning after. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: It packs a hydration punch without the grease.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I personally like most of the brands products thus I was not surprised that this one delivered as well. It has a very light fragrance that is barely noticeable but it is not clinical or medicinal so I really like that, it’s still indicative of a skin product. The color is clear and the texture is smooth, silky, not sticky and very watery that you definitely need a dropper for it to be the most effective. I tried the product for a week and I did not have the dropper so I used my finger and it was hard to gauge how much product to use plus due to its consistency it was hard to keep it on my finger without it spilling or rolling off of it. So I ended up using about 5 drops per side of my face concentrating on the under eye area. I have to say the initial feeling is not impressive but the results speak for themselves. It dries and absorbs very quickly and does not make your skin feel greasy or sticky or as if you have a mask on but you can still feel the moisture that hydrates the whole day it seems and you skin becomes smooth and soft and even more plump to the touch and stays like that for hours and that is only on the initial. When using consistently your skin changes the texture of how it should be in the first place, smooth, hydrated and plump. My only dislike was the lack of the dropper and the consistency to too watery for my liking and I was not used to the product being absorbed so quickly into my skin. I usually prefer to see and feel the product for a while, however I can’t argue with the visible results. Thank you. Will continue using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product in the past and loved it, but do not like the new formula. I received this product for free from influencer to try and did not like it this time around.  Pros: it did reduce blotchiness on my cheeks Cons: it broke me out in places that I never get breakouts  I can’t 100% say the breakouts were from this product, but I never break out on my upper cheeks and got quite a free blemishes after using. While I really liked the previous formula, I’d recommend a different product.

Overall it’s a nice product that doesn’t break out my sensitive skin. Does the job, but not any better than some less expensive serums I’ve tried.

So I thought eh it's ok. Then my husband came home from work. He kissed me hello as always and was setting his stuff down as we were chatting. He stopped and was like wow your...then he stopped. I was like what??? He said we'll i was going to say your makeup looks really nice, but then I looked closer and saw your not wearing make-up. Your skin looks beautiful, almost glowy. I said SHUT-UP!! Are you kidding me? He said no why? I then told him I started using a new serum tonight and it was literally the only thing on my face. So I am a believer!!! I would buy a vat of this stuff if I could afford it!! Absolutely love the results it gave. Whatever they did to reformulate this serum it worked. They created an incredible product. I would definitely recommend trying it if you get the chance. I will only be repurchasing if they have a big sale going on. Girls on a budget ya know....lol

I was only given a weeks worth of a sample to try, but I heard that if you use in the morning as well it gives you a little extra boost. I received this product for free to test and review, but I would consider buying the full size option to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes your skin feel some smooth and hydrated. I wake up the next morning feeling the same. Doesn’t irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It helped to even out my skin tone & I woke up with glowing skin every morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There was a noticeable difference in my skin after using it. It was more hydrated and glowy and very soft. I prefer to alternate it throughout the week with my other serums.

But I have to say it works and is worth every penny. I’ve been using it for about a month now, and my skin has a luminous glow that I’ve never seen before.  While it says you can use night and day, I’ve only been using it at night underneath my moisturizer. You only need a little product, so even though it’s expensive, I feel the bottle is going to last a long while. I’m definitely making this a part of my standard nighttime routine from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I was skeptical, BUT this really improved my face. It has really started to fade my dark spots and my breakouts do not seem to last as long. My only complaint is the price! I’m not one to splurge on myself but this is something I actually want to purchase. Just need to save up for that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, this product didn’t do a ton for me. The serum went on really nice and wasn’t sticky. It didn’t leave a residue. But I also didn’t see any difference in my skin after using it for a week. This just might not be a product that my skin needs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay...I was super skeptical but this has 100 % helped my skin! It’s so much more hydrated and glowy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day sample complimentary from Influenster. This serum isn’t bad. The smell is a little strong. It seemed to absorb pretty well. I haven’t noticed a big difference from using the product so that’s a little disappointing. It’s not bad though just not my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only been using this product for a few days but I love the way it feels on the skin! Very light and makes my skin look glowy! A little goes a long way. The scent is light which I enjoy. I have sensitive skin and it has not irritated me at all. I hope this product will keep making my skin glowy and youthful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed testing out this serum. I used it before applying moisturizer at night. I have very dry skin with some texture and recent acne scarring. I found that this product was moisturizing enough that it was comfortable under my moisturizer and did not leave an oily residue or feeling on my skin, so I feel that it would work for those with oily skin as well. It absorbs quickly after application. I felt that it improved my overall skin texture, leaving it much smoother and softer. I do not have any dark spots on my skin but it did seem to help heal the recent acne scarring. This is really one of the best serums I’ve been sent to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very nervous to try this product as my skin can be really sensitive. I started using it and fell in love with it. My skin has been so soft and looks really good. Most days I even go without makeup. I received a sample from Influenster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free trial from Influenster and I cannot get enough of this product! When they say a little goes a long way, that definitely is the case. I like the light herbally scent this serum has and it doesn’t feel heavy on my face at all. It gives me a glowy look in the morning that i love. I will be so sad when the sample runs out but will definitely be purchasing !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free to review and test. I’m always looking for a new product to make my skin look younger and more youthful. I’ve been using this after cleaning my face and it goes on very easily and isn’t heavy. I do feel like it is making my skin feel softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First let me say as a user of this line of products for many years, the need for this product depends on your age.  The process of cell renewal occurs when we sleep; our skin goes into recovery mode.  As we get older, this recovery mode no longer works the same way on its own and so this product helps to facilitate it.  When I was younger, this serum made no difference.  I think it’s because I was renewing my cells naturally on my own back then so I couldn’t see a difference.  So I stopped using it.  BUT, now that I’m older, I can’t live without this serum.  If I travel without it, my skin gets mad at me.  I now need this in my life every single night.  I do not recommend this serum to anyone under the age of 30.  I would highly highly highly recommend this as a holy grail to anyone aged 30+.  It’s a must-have for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a week sample to try and overall I like the product. Makes my skin feel firm and moisturized. Doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, cause excess breakouts, or increase redness. Scent is fresh but not overpowering or perfumey. My only complaint is no dropper but I believe the larger bottles do come with one! If it was a little cheaper i would probably buy to include in my routine but I’m admittedly a bargain hunter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Night one of using this serum thanks to influenster. Has not had a bad effect on my skin as it is usually sensitive and is not sticky like most brands. Can't wait to see what this can do for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did nothing for me except make my skin sticky.  My skin was no more youthful, glowing, or anything. I used it twice a day for 2 weeks. Complete waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

I can’t tell a drastic difference in my skin but I can say that it does a good job of hydrating my skin. In the morning, my skin feels refreshed. I feel as thought I would need to try the product out for longer to give a full review of all of the claims. I typically like Estée Lauder products. Has a nice consistency and I would guess will be a good product for a long period of time.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the price. Smells like paint!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I notice with all products is the smell and this serum smells very bad like paint! I do like to use serums and this did leave my skin hydrated; however, my skin was felt more on the oily side and sticky after applying. I received only a week’s worth of a sample so I did not see any initial effect on my skin appearing more firm at all. I would suggest trying a sample size to see how you like it but it’s hard to recommend something so expensive that didn’t wow me or really do anything for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good. So far, my sensitive skin hasn’t broken out from using this. It goes on smoothly and has been part of my skin regimen for the past few weeks. I haven’t seen any major changes in my skin though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good product. I like that it tightens the area around myeye. it also doesnt feel gready or sticky. I can apply it and it virtually disappears. The only reason why I gave it s4 star is because i need to use it ite to see it's long lasting effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only had a 7 day trial of this to review but I will say I didn’t notice much of a difference other than feeling more moisturized. I feel like this product costs entirely too much for the results I got (it didn’t get).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I want to hate this product because it is so pricey, I absolutely love it.  It has become a staple in my nightly routine. It applies like an oil and feels so refreshing on your skin especially around the eyes. A little goes a long way so it makes me feel a little better about the price.  Seems to be working well to even out my skin and reducing fine lines, although I am 22 and wrinkles are not a huge issue for me yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying this serum for the last two weeks now.  It is a fairly thick serum, so a little goes a long way.  I noticed it has a very light floral-like fragrance to it.  I noticed right away that it made my skin look healthy and glowy.  It wasn’t greasy or oily.  In fact, it was the exact opposite.  It had a matte finish, but didn’t make my skin look or feel dry.  It made my skin feel hydrated.  I don’t have any wrinkles, so I can’t say if it has any affect on that like it says it does, but I do like the way that it makes my skin look and feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to test as a sample. Is is a great serum. I don't have many wrinkles but the few i do have were almost completely smooth in just a week. After the first use my skin was glowing and felt amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair for a couple weeks now. I received a 1 week sample from Influenster but it’s lasted me longer, as I only use what’s needed to cover my face. It definitely does hydrate my skin and make it feel plump. Although I have enjoyed using this and the way it makes my skin feel, I just can’t see myself spending that much money on a product when there are others that make my skin feel the same way. Had I been able to see other changes or improvements in my skin, I may have a different opinion. As always, this review is based upon my own experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample to test for a week, and I’m very happy with this product. I added it to my skincare routine, and applied it every night for almost 10 days. During this period, I felt my skin plumped and hydrated. It looked radiant and healthier. I wish I had more product to see the long term results.  Pros:  - easy to apply and is rapidly absorbed by skin, - few drops is enough for all face, - Don’t make skin oily - akin looks plumped in the morning  Cons: - little expensive  Overall, it’s a great product and I’m considering buying it to see if it really helps with fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free one week sample. After using it for a week I noticed slight changes in the suppleness of my skin. It didn’t look as tired. I am interested to see how my skin would look after using this product for 30 days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s nice. I recieved a complimentary sample from Influenster so it was only enough for a week. It’s nice. It felt moisturizing but not oily. It’s thin and it sets into the skin quickly. I like how my skin looked when I woke up in the morning like it was healthy and moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to preface this review by mentioning I received this product free in exchange for an honest review. I am an Asian woman in my mid 20s suffering from overactive skin texture and occasional breakouts. Mt current skin regime does include a serum that i paused using while i used this product.   The first thing one notices about this product is it's scent. There is a citrusy scent that reminds me of citrus flavored cough medicine. Although this was not a big turnoff for me, I know there are others who dislike fragrance in skincare, even more so if it smells like what sick tastes like.   I used this product daily every night for a week, although the instructions says you can use it in the morning as well. The biggest take away i got from using this product was my skin didn't feel as greasy when I woke up the next morning. My skin felt moisturized without having to use my facial oil overnight. Another thing was that aside from stress pimples and mascne here and there, I did notice my skin texture have calmed down a bit.  If this product wasn't so spendy on a struggling career woman's wallet, it would definitely be a part of my nightly routine. Alas, unfortunately a bottle of this product costs more than two weeks worth of groceries so I shall pass. I will consider it for the right price (maybe black Friday price?) Though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a week’s worth of this serum to sample.  It has a very faint natural smell which might be off putting to some.  It made my skin smoother and felt nice when I applied it.  I’m not sure it’s worth the cost as I haven’t noticed any significant change in the overall look of my skin but I may just need to continue using it constantly to see real results.  I like that it’s free of parable a and sulfates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes these freebies are hit or miss. This one was unfortunately a miss for me. Was hoping for a nice maskne rescue moment but this left my face super textured and not smooth in the slightest. This doesn’t mean it’s not a great product, just didn’t work for me. For reference I am 30 years old with combination skin, not normally sensitive.  I did receive a sample of this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample. The serum was size sample (enough for 1 week of trying) so I can not say so much about it but that it felt nice while I was applying over my face, it's not greasy and I stopped waking up with my face full of oil as I was used to. I guess you should try any product more than one week to start seeing results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

You know the taste of a really bad vitamin c pill with no coating, that's what it smells like. I used it as directed each night and each morning my face felt more moisturized, taut, and not so sleepy looking. I wish this stuff wasn't so expensive or I would buy it for myself.

I believe my skin has been soft and supple. I used morning and night. A little bit goes a long way. I think I need to use it longer to see results. This would be a good product to add to your self-care routine.

reviews.review_title: A pretty penny... but worth it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum complimentary of Influenster to try, but my review of the product is honest.  I'm a huge fan of serums, and this one is no joke. I have insanely dry, irritated skin that's prone to redness, fine lines and hormonal acne. Just a few drops of this product nightly has made a huge difference in the appearance of my skin! I wake up and theres actual moisture on my face where flakes used to be. My skin look brighter, more evened out, hydrated and youthful! It does have a strange scent but not perfume like, which I prefer since I'm sensitive to fragrance in skincare. The scent doesnt ladt once applied, so that's also a plus. I can honestly say in the month I've been using this my face has seen an overall improvement. Can you find something to do the same thing in a lower price range? Probably. But if you have it and are willing to splurge....I think it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Little to no scent. I love the texture if it. You don't need a lot, easy to spread onto the entire face. Does not irritate my sensitive skin. Makes my complexion even toned and look brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this specific sample for review purposes but have gotten this in a Sephora favorites set in the past and it is worth every penny. When I apply this after all my moisturizers at night I wake up the next morning with soft and hydrated skin. My skin has been going through it after having a baby and this product is such a game changer and once I run out I’ll be buying the full size because it’s that good. I would recommend this for anyone with dark spots, dry or dehydrated skin, and for anyone who loves that glow to their skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from influenster for testing purposes. At first, I was skeptical about a nighttime serum vs a regular one. But I ended up being really impressed by the product. It went on smooth and helped reduce fine lines overtime. I’m early 30s so protecting my skin is really important right now, and I’ll definitely be investing in the full size product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works with consistency and over time. I use it at night before my moisturizer. The serum is thin and spreads very easily. It absorbs quickly and I don’t have to wait before putting on my moisturizer. Over time, I noticed that my skin feels much softer. Also, the serum evened our minor imperfections and dark spots. It’s not a miracle but works over time and with consistent use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like how my skin feels after using this product. It’s not sticky, the skin absorbs it very well. My skin is more bright and my pores are a little smaller. I went to a facial and told me my skin was very hydrated. I used this product before, it was only one day and I felt my skin more hydrated and softer after using the old formula and it was only for one day. This one didn’t have the effect. Maybe is because now I live in Arizona and is super dry here. I probably buy this product because I know that with consistency it will work. It’s a little expensive though.   I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good serum for combo, aging skin.  Many things leave my skin like an oil slick.  This feels super clean on my skin.  I have deep furrows in my brow area.  This helps to plump the skin in the area blurring the appearance of that damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product as a courtesy in exchange for an honest review. I only got to use it for about a week but I loved it. My skin felt amazing. I would buy it again if it wasn't so pricey but if you can afford it, totally worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Leaves my skin feeling and looking wonderful.

reviews.review_title: Good but unsure about the impact on my skin

reviews.review_text: Pros: lightweight formula, a little product goes a long way, easily absorbs into skin  Can’t really think of any cons in the formula itself except I’m not noticing any significant changes in my skin with this product on its own. Would give the full product a try on a sale to see if it made a long term difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

Pues les cuento que lo yo lo alargue para que el producto me durara dos semana. La verdad es que es un éxito, mi rostro en las mañana luce radiante, brillante sumamente reluciente.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this at night as my serum step and it really helped my skin. I can’t speak yet for long term use but the sample I had I was able to stretch to about 14 days. With just the first use my skin looked and felt more hydrated. Two weeks in y skin was looking more glowy, way more hydrated, and I noticed some light scars and scrapes had disappeared. This is one skincare item that I believe is worth the investment! I did receive this complimentary to test through influencer.

reviews.review_text: I have received a free sample from Influenster and tried this product every Night for a whole week. I was super satisfied with how amazing my skin looks, it’s looks youthful And had a glow!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was super impressed with this serum. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that it had quite a strong scent and it is pretty pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used up multiple bottles of the Estée Lauder ANR in the past. It’s just such an amazing serum – lightweight but still hydrating to the skin. After consistent use for a while, it definitely makes my combo, acne-prone skin more balanced and healthier. This newest generation is supposed to be most comprehensive ANR serum ever. It still has the lightweight serum consistency and continues to keep my skin hydrated and balanced (received a sample of the newest generation for my honest opinion).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I received this item compliments of Influenster. Over the last 8 days I have used the Advanced Night Repair recovery serum. It seems to make my fave glow more and seems to retain moisture very well. It feels fairly light on your face as well. You can use during the daytime as well. However, I only used at night after my face was washed. I will say though that I found it to be a bit tacky for the first several minutes. It did have a slight smell to it that I was not fond of as well.  Overall, I would recommend to friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been enjoying using the serum for about a week now. It goes on nicely on the skin and I feel it being absorbed into it as opposed to just sitting on top of my skin like some other serums do. There’s no scent and no stickiness/pilling, which are added pros. However, for a $105 serum, I’d want more moisturizing - I do wake up with brighter skin, but I notice my skin is a bit dry even though my skincare routine involves several steps of moisturizing and sans this serum, I’ve had no issues with dry skin in the morning before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price, I had really high expectations and they weren’t exactly met. The serum is very nourishing and hydrating and my skin felt so soft. I think this is a product that will have to be used very long term to see actual results. For the price, I think you can get similar results in a cheaper product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free sample of this product. I did not notice any significant difference to my skin. It was moisturizing but for the price there is much better skin care out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Advanced Night Repair is amazing. I have been using it for a week and I can see the difference in my skin. This product provides hydration for my skin and I can see the results. I really like that my skin feels more soft and hydrate. I have been using it right after I clean my face before going to bet. I have received this free product from influenster for testing purposes. I have decided to buy it now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Went on smooth and easy. Felt light and didn’t make my face feel sticky, even on the hottest summer nights. Was gentle and didn’t irritate my skin. My skin looked pretty good in the morning after wearing this. A little went a long way! Cons: the smell reminded me of pickles, which wasn’t very sexy for a night cream. My wrinkles didn’t seem to improve after two weeks of use.

reviews.review_text: I tried out thIs Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair serum and holy Toledo!! My skin was glowing after the first use and my sister instantly noticed the difference and commented on how gorgeous my skin is when I sent her a selfie (for other stuff).   The scent isn’t exactly amazing but the results are sooo worth it. Goes on really nice and I lightly tap it into my skin  - when I wake up in the morning my skin is soft and ready for a new day.   Perfect for super sensitive skin like mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I tried this out for exactly one week to see how well it would work. When I opened it I was super skeptical on how it would even last me a week (I got the sample size) but you don’t need that much to begin with. I don’t think it has a funny smell and the texture is like a watered down gel. It doesn’t feel heavy on my face which I appreciate but I will say I can actually feel some tightening, idk if it’s just me or that’s what you should feel. I had spots on my face and my spots started fading with it. It also gave me a glow, which I’m surprised at how much skin can change in one week. I feel like I look younger and less tired despite the fact my sleep keeps getting progressively worse. I put it on around the same time every day (along with my usual facial routine) and clean my face off with just toner in the AM so nothing special being done. I’m super excited to have gotten sent this to try for free but I will say I’m low key sad I probably won’t be getting it again because it’s pricey. Although Christmas is around the corner and this is something worth the splurge to help the face out. (Price is why I deducted a star)

I definitely noticed an improvement in my skin after three weeks of use. I have been battling with uneven skin tone around my upper cheekbones area and it is finally evening out:) I also noticed my skin looks more radiant, like a nice glow from within look. I will definitely love to purchase the serum but it's too expensive so I will have to save up before I make a purchase (Ladies, we’ve to glow up responsibly). Overall, it does what it claims so I give it a strong 4 (it would be a 5 if the bottle was bigger and affordably priced).

It plumps lines, locks in moisture, tightens, protects from environmental damage. It doesn’t have a strong smell which I like and it didn’t feel like a primer or too thick. reviews.review_text: I received this product free of charge but my reviews are my own. I tested this product for only a week as the sample size I received was very small. Since this is a peptide heavy serum, I knew that results would take longer than a week to show as you need to use peptides for long term to see any actual results. Besides that, my first impression of the serum was that it was pretty hydrating (I'm assuming this is from the Hyaluronic Acid) and that there was a weird no fragrance smell. Even though this serum also includes ferments, I did not notice any brightening effects. The instructions also mentioned that you only need a few drops but since my sample did not come with a dropper, it was a bit hard to see exactly how much I need. A dime amount did cover my face and neck sufficiently but I do have a smaller face. For the price of this serum, I cannot recommend this as I did not see any noticeable difference in my face except for hydration but I have much cheaper and more effective serums in my skincare routine for just that. I am also not convinced that the peptides in this serum are effective enough to show any long term difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This little cutie was sent complimentary to trial the new formula of this cult classic: Advanced Night Repair. I’ve never used the original formula so I was excited to give this a go! I tried to research what changed from this to the old one but simply found that it’s meant to be more firming than the previous version. And they added a new blend called Chronulux and Hyaluronic Acid is now present in the formulation.  I’m trying hard to get this to work, but it just isn’t doing it for me. I’m not really noticing much of a difference in my skin - how it looks (they said to watch lines/pores) or how it feels (it’s supposed to be forming but I’m not noticing that). I’m having a hard time using this as part of my routine too. It’s causing my other products to pill up. I quickly learned it’s really something that needs to be used all on its own.  The texture is very gel like and silky; no scent to my nose. It would be good for you if your routine is simple and you want to use only one step. This worked best for me when I used just this.

Also my skin is incredibly soft! If you’ve ever used the Phat Facial from Ole Henkrikon and know how baby-smoothe your skin is after using that, THIS MAKES YOUR SKIN LIKE THAT DAILY. The price point is on the high side but it’s so worth it. New holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this so far! Goes on very well under moisturizer and doesn’t have a strong scent. Not sure if it makes a difference on my skin yet though. Will keep using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this as a hydrating toner for the past week now, and have been thoroughly satisfied with how hydrated and plump my skin feels. I have experienced zero irritation, and love how quickly it sinks into my skin. There is a light fragrance that dissipates a few seconds after application, but after it’s absorbed, you can’t really notice anything but a nicely hydrated surface. I didn’t have high hopes for this product, honestly, but I am pleasantly surprised. I wouldn’t hesitate to incorporate this into my daily routine in the future, or as an alternative to my current hydrating toner. It has an impressive ingredient list, and now I’m a believer of the hype that surrounds this OG product. Highly recommend! I received this complimentary for testing purposes, but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a skin care JUNKIE and always trying out new stuff although I have my staples, I love and live for giving my skin new stuff so when I knew I was going to receive this product for me to try I was super excited to do so being that its a new revamped formula made me want to give it a try even more especially since I'm almost hitting 40 (sad) and I tend to care for my skind even more that the average gal, now let me say the very first night I used it by the morning I noticed a difference and I'm not just saying it too look good I'm legitimately saying it cause I was amazed and how my skin appeared before my eyes in one night only my skin looked glowy like I had actually used some sort of primer, now let me say that directions say to use this product and then apply your night moisturizer per usual and that I didn't do just because I wanted to be able to give this producy a good review and not interrump it by using anything else and let me say I continued to use it that way for the remainder of my trial (I only received a trial amount which was good for a week) I can honestly say that my skin look more youthful and the texture has improved dramatically and I had a few visible pores that too has improved which is by far the best part who doesn't want youthful and glowy skin I know I do so yes please and I will most definitely be getting a full size of this stuff cause it's amazwballs!!!

It’s perfect for my dehydrated combination skin!  As for its anti-aging effect, it will be difficult to judge because it’s an anti-oxidant effect, therefore rather preventive and not really visible in the short term. Now I am a fan of anti-oxidant products that I have been using in my skincare routine for ages (so I definitely believe in their long-term effect!).

I use this product after cleansing and toning. I apply and only a small amount is needed. After I apply my night cream or oil. After one week I noticed enhanced clarity in the tone of my skin. I’m still waiting to see if it will help improve fine lines and wrinkles but there is an enhanced radiance to my skin. I took one star off for the price and the smell which is a bit off putting. It’s also quite expensive but I think they are various sizes to choose from. I was given a free sample to try in exchange for my honest thoughts and experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in my recent Influenster package and I am extremely impressed with this serum. I did not expect to see much change in my skin with only a weeks worth of product but from day one it has left my skin soft and glowy. I can’t speak about the longevity and effectiveness for the reduction of fine lines and wrinkles, but it certainly combats dryness and dullness quickly. The serum is relatively thick but slippery and soaked into the skin well. It leaves the slightest tackiness. The scent is...interesting. I don’t think I like it very much but it’s not overpowering and goes away quickly. It’s kind of earthy/herbal? The price tag is hefty but you can get away with using less product than usual. That being said, I personally can’t justify spending $100+ on a serum. I would probably buy the mini size again if I have an important event coming up and I wanted my skin to look good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this every night for the past week and I really like the way it makes my skin feel. I’m already starting to see a small difference in my skin.  I will definitely purchase when this sample runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is very nice not thick at all, goes on very smooth. It's definitely a favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a one week sample of this product and really enjoyed it. I did notice that my skin appeared more hydrated and radiant within the first few uses. By the end of the week my skin tone seemed slightly more even as well. The only reason I cannot give 5 stars is because I cannot speak to long term results as it should take 4 weeks of daily use to see maximum results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After 3 uses I noticed my skin is super happy and plump! I apply to wet skin(anything w HA) and it absorbs so beautifully. Definitely recommend trying it out. I see my post acne marks and fine lines improving already!!
